DESCRIPTION: Tilith explains Grand Gaia's situation in the Cave of Flames. The Summoner must embark on a far and long journey to defeat the Four Fallen Gods...
At Egor Snowfield, Tilith mentions the importance of Elements regarding Units. Thunder beats Water, etc... A good thing to consider for future fights.
The Summoner reaches the Forest of Beasts, where enemies hunt wild animals for food. The usage of Spheres is carefully explained here as well.
The humidity in Magutagal Wetlands puts Tilith in a bad mood, though she does shed light on the Sparks created by multiple synchronized attacks.
Tilith is impressed that the Summoner has been able to reach Mirza's Remains safely. As a reward, she explains the benefits of using Leader Skills.
Rumors say that a mysterious swordsman lurks in the Monster's Nest. Though Tilith swears she's not afraid, she looks pretty scared indeed...
Now at the Tower of Mistral, the liberation of the whole region is but a step away. However, Creator Maxwell has built quite a terrifying opponent...
The Summoner successfully defeats the Juggernaut, earning Tilith's praise. Lucius will now open the way towards the unknown land of Morgan.
Searching for Tilith, our Summoner enters the Kagan Desert. A coincidental meeting with Karl reveals that he is after the demon Graham.
At Breeze Beach Tilith hears of a beautiful, yet indifferent swordswoman. However, she's confident that she's much prettier than this rumored beauty.
Karl hurts himself while pursuing Graham. The Nocturnal Forest is said to be the turf of one of Graham's subordinates who is attacking many Summoners.
Karl is successful in driving out Graham from the Nocturnal Forest. With nowhere to run, it's time to settle everything in the Asekutt Wastelands.
Seria, a member of the Demon Slayers, shows herself at the Shrine of Lystia. According to her, Graham is one of Abaddon's most treasured underlings.
Seria goes belligerent on the Summoner. Though Karl wants to continue to the Destroyed Cathedral as a team of three, Seria's not making it easy...
Having finally reached Abaddon's stronghold in the Tower of Morgan, Karl and Seria fend off incoming enemies to help the Summoner press forward.
Abaddon has been defeated. After meeting Karl and once again parting ways, Tilith and the Summoner head towards St. Lamia in search of Maxwell.
At Volcano Eldent, Tilith warns that ignoring one's duties is unacceptable. She says she has never slacked off when it comes to her job, but...
Though Tilith tries to give some background on Sacred Mt. Craylia, she doesn't seem to be doing very well. She has supposedly caught a cold...
Tilith tries her best to pretend her condition is not aggravating while in the Blood Forest. But it's clear to see it's taking a toll on her...
Tilith finally confesses about her bad physical condition in Mt. Wistorea. Maxwell's curse affects her even more as she approaches St. Lamia Palace.
At the Secluded Sanctuary, Tilith finally collapses. Entrusting her to Seria, the Summoner heads towards St. Lamia Palace alone to vanquish the curse.
After being rescued by Karl, the Summoner goes after Maxwell in St. Lamia Palace. Can Tilith truly be saved from this terrible curse?!
With the curse broken, Tilith comes back to her normal self, but somehow ends up in a dramatic argument with Seria...
Once Eriole learns that the Akras Summoners' Hall has opened the southern region of Mistral, he send Paris to Cordelica...
An encounter with the Demon Slayer Lugina occurs in Greskya Caves. Since he has no respect for the Regular Army, he demands that the Summoner leave.
At Ignia Falls, Lugina sheds light on how both the Randall Empire and the Akras Summoners' Hall influence life in Elgaia.
Lugina explains how the Summoner Army works while in Lomass Forest. And as an elite, he demands that the Summoner respect his authority.
Paris shows herself in Valtan Fortress. She asks the Summoner for cooperation regarding the land survey on Cordelica, but...
While heading to the Tower of Light, Paris mentions that the Summoner is a friend of Karl's, but Lugina doesn't buy it. He doesn't seem fond of Karl.
Paris explains in the Cordelica Mine that a race of giants inhabited the island long ago. It would seem that the god of the giants has awaken as well.
While Lugina goes on a mission to defeat the giant god Grantos in the Giant's Ruins, Paris asks the Summoner to demonstrate what real power is.
Having learned that the Summoner defeated Grantos, Eriole laughs while proclaiming that the world is heading towards the right direction...
Lucius guides the Summoner to the Palmyna Archipelago, while a certain man in Randall is informed that the barrier over the same islands has vanished.
The next target is Cardes the Malevolent, another of the Four Fallen Gods. In Julep Village you hear that half of his power is still sealed away.
Tilith claims not to be scared aboard the Ghost Ship Legnia. However, she does give some information about Palmyna, where Cardes is sealed...
The Summoner is suddenly attacked by a strange man in Elios Plains. But this mysterious man's presence disappears just as fast as it showed itself.
A meeting with Seria and Karl in the Saji Mines reveals they are still after Graham. Karl warns the Summoner against someone called Zebra.
Tilith and her Summoner run into "Elder Grah" in Lamellia Temple. The old man claims to be investigating the folklore linked to the Four Fallen Gods.
Karl and Seria corner Graham in Ghost Town Edila, but they are blown away by an unknown and powerful force, allowing Graham to escape.
Showing himself at Amdahl Castle, Elder Grah tells of the vengeful spirit of Amdahl's last emperor, which apparently still lurks about the castle.
Elder Grah is impressed with the Summoner's ability to vanquish the evil spirit. Seria rushes over, and it seems that she knows the elder somehow.
Guided by Lucius, the Summoner reaches Encervis. According to Tilith, a human civil war ravaged this land a long time ago.
After reaching Elsta Crater, Tilith tells the Summoner how hard she's been working so far. However, her claims seem questionable somehow...
Zebra suddenly attacks at Lake Aldela, but Elder Grah's assistance prevents any serious damage. This powerful enemy seems to live in a floating fort.
Elder Grah tells of the history of Amdahl while wondering about Castle Avenia. He asks the Summoner to destroy the sky fort, but Tilith's apathetic...
Zebra and the Dark Figure are found in the Gadillian Ravine talking about how to handle the Summoner. Just what could their relationship be...?
Seria and Karl search for the Summoner at Alman Mausoleum. They both say they want to use their power to help bring down the sky fort.
In the Land of the Dead, Tilith reveals that the sky fort's official name is Solaris. She intends to use her powers to help infiltrate it.
Thanks to Tilith's powers, the infiltration of Sky Fort Solaris is a success. Zebra sees this as an opening to attack the exhausted goddess.
Zebra has finally been defeated. However, he destroys Solaris trying to bring the Summoner down with him. Who can prevent this tragedy...?
The Summoner reaches Palmyna through Lucius's guidance. Traces of a kingdom which fought against the gods are still very much apparent here.
Though initially in Obselion Castle, Tilith heads to Dejour Ruins in a hurry to warn that the seal on Cardes has begun to wear off.
Grahdens is left alone with the Summoner at Obselion Castle. He shares the story of the 4 Heroes of Palmyna who sealed Cardes the Malevolent away.
At Emerald Path, Seria and Karl learn that they must travel to the spirit world in order to defeat Cardes. Seria is acting rather strange though...
While passing through the Grandelt Ruins, Tilith reveals that Cardes's body is slowly disintegrating, and that his godly powers are running rampant.
In Arlind Seminary, Grahdens expresses his doubts regarding the past and recent movements of the gods. His thoughts seem to influence the Summoner.
Karl and Seria accompany the Summoner to the gates of the underworld in the Noera Battleground. They are both worried about Tilith.
The Summoner and the others split up to find Cardes in the Spirit World of Palmyna. Can he be defeated before he destroys everything?
Just when everyone tries to escape the now crumbling underworld, Seria suffers an injury. In this desperate situation, Tilith appears to save the day.
After hearing Paris's report, Eriole dispatches her to Lizeria. What could he possibly be looking for?
Lugina shows up in Erinecht Plains and claims to have a mission much more important than that of the Summoner's. His feisty attitude hasn't changed.
After reaching Golzo Mountains, it is revealed that Paris is in search of a dormant power in Lizeria. And it seems Lugina is after the same thing.
At Lodan Frozen Lake, Lugina wrongly assumes that Paris has betrayed the Summoner. Everything is clarified, but Lugina insists on training...
Paris talks about the social structure of Elgaia while in the Impassable Marshlands. It feels like she distrusts the power of the Summoners' Hall.
In the Lightning Forest Zaljiba, Paris mentions the dark side of the Summoners' Hall. Lugina is then questioned about it, and he answers accordingly.
Paris shares her doubts about the gods and talks about the world's instability in Lost City La Veda. She wants to take matters into her own hands.
Atop the Black Bridge, Lugina says he will crush anyone who gets in his way, and makes one last confession to the Summoner before moving forward.
Though Lugina loses to the Summoner, he claims that there is no way he could have failed, and continues to deny his own defeat.
At the Tower of Destruction, an injured Paris still refuses to give up on the dormant power in the region. She won't forgive the Summoner's intrusion.
A defense system capable of destroying Summoners. However, whatever Paris is looking for, which should've been close, is nowhere to be seen...
Tilith and the Summoner set off to defeat Zevalhua the Supreme. Unbeknownst to them, Eriole and Paris are on their way to Agni as well...
In Glomore Hollow, Karl and Seria state they want to help defeat Zevalhua while a mysterious woman scornfully watches from afar.
After reaching Snow Area Khelne, Disciple Mare suddenly appears and asks Karl to meet her in the Azura Ruins alone to reveal a certain secret to him.
Seria worries about Karl while wondering in Stokhelna Forest when Mare shows herself again to say that Karl has played right into her hands...
Seria falls into Mare's trap in the Azura Ruins, and suffers an injury. Tilith leaves Karl's rescue in the Summoner's hands while she cares for Seria.
Grahdens awaits the Summoner in the Ryvern Mountains and shares his memories of Karl. He says he will get himself captured by Mare to break Karl out.
Mare shows herself in front of the lone Summoner within the Abyss Cave. Just as she prepares to launch an attack, Tilith returns and prevents it.
Mare unleashes Granvalm on the Summoner in the White Tower, and escapes. However, Tilith won't let her get away so easily.
Mare appears once again after having defeated Granvalm, and in the midst of this dire situation, an unforeseen ally saves everyone's hides...
Lugina saves the Summoner in Ryvern to honor Grahdens's request. He also insists that he was asked to help with Karl's rescue.
In the Agni Empire, Lugina is very excited about the rescue mission. He claims it's the perfect chance to complete his mission and make fun of Karl.
Tired of waiting for Mare to make an appearance, Lugina leaves the Summoner in Agniria Coast and goes off to search for Karl on his own...
Mare finally shows herself at Granasta Plateau. But she is not willing to fight. Instead, she demands that the Summoner follow her to save Karl.
Mare has flashbacks of a certain person who fought in the war against the gods while the anguished Summoner chases her into Thunder Summit Navara.
The Summoner advances into the King's Tomb without losing hope of rescuing Karl. Mare cannot understand such obstinacy, leading her to finally strike.
Just when Mare is about to deal her finishing blow in Lognea Cove, Seria, who was supposed to be gravely injured, jumps in to save the Summoner.
A horde of enemies appears in Ocean Shrine Albina, leaving Seria and the Summoner in a bind. However, Lugina shows up with a freed Karl just in time.
Mare is finally defeated by the Summoner, but on a moment's notice, Paris appears to report that Grahdens has been taken captive.
The Summoner finally sets foot on Mirvana. Tilith explains that this was the setting of the bloodiest battle during the great war with the gods.
Grahdens has been captured by Zevalhua the Supreme. In order to save him, the Summoner and the others split into groups in the Cave of Darkness.
In Arvest Snowfield, Paris wonders suspiciously about why the gods have taken Grahdens prisoner instead of just killing him right off the bat...
While searching for Grahdens in Marleg Ocean of Trees, Paris invites the Summoner to join her cause once again. Tilith ends up interrupting though.
Lugina chastises Paris in the Bog of Eternal Rain. However, just before things get worse, Seria joins the fun and gets into an argument with Lugina.
Grahdens's location is confirmed after reaching Cape Narasta, and Paris questions why Lucius doesn't defeat the Four Fallen Gods himself.
Karl thanks Tilith when she discloses more information on Grahdens in the Mirvana Ruins. Lugina and Seria, however, continue their usual quarrel.
The whole group has reached the Tower of the Gods at last. Can they accomplish their goal of defeating Zevalhua the Supreme to rescue Grahdens?
Grahdens shows himself and reveals the secret of Karl's birth. At the same time, Eriole suddenly makes an appearance, cutting in to talk to the elder.
The Vriksha region is the land under control of the last Fallen God, Beast God Afla Dilith. Tilith reminisces about when she first met the Summoner.
In the Ulga Lava Cave, Grahdens and Eriole both go after Afla Dilith, announcing that the Summoner will now work hand in hand with the Empire.
Afla Dilith's disciple, Zurg, suddenly shows himself in Sea Capital Almeria. He confesses to be interested in the Summoner's many recent victories.
Zurg appears again in the Forest of Old to explain how Lanara was ravaged by a human civil war, and how Afla Dilith alone can truly save the world.
The Summoner runs into Grahdens at Danrard Fortress. Zurg shows himself as well, explaining how human folly has afflicted this land.
While in Lanara's Light Ruins, Eriole questions Lucius's motives for helping the human race springing doubts within Tilith.
Zurg talks about human folly once again in the Cave of Dark Crystals. He then asks the Summoner if the gods who punished the humans were mistaken.
The group meets Zurg anew in Alnakeid Castle. After slaying the underworld gods there, Zurg will acknowledge the Summoner's power and reveal a truth.
After defeating the otherworldly gods, Zurg appears and makes the Summoner choose whether to join him, or die. However, an unexpected guest arrives...
The Summoner heads to Vriksha to hunt down Afla Dilith. Nonetheless, Tilith seems to have taken Zurg's words to heart...
In Mt. Olmond, Karl makes sure that everyone's on the same page. Everyone says they don't care about what Zurg has to say, but...
Zurg shows up in Rownor Beach and demands that the humans to go to Sky Palace Talahr without the goddess Tilith. Only then will he reveal the truth.
While in the Vriksha Duchy, Tilith asks everyone to decide if they truly want to fight alongside her only after listening to Zurg's spiel first.
Paris reveals the real intentions of the Imperial Guard at the Red Lake, stating that they are a totally different faction separate from the empire.
In the Sky Palace Talahr, Zurg tells the true story behind the so-called Four Fallen Gods, and claims that Lucius is the real enemy.
The Summoner and the others meet up with Tilith in the Dark Castle Damrigia. Every single person says they want to continue fighting beside Tilith.
The group arrives to Adan's Tower with Tilith. Having witnessed this, Zurg declares them his enemies, and vows to destroy them.
After Eriole deals a crushing blow to Zurg, he confesses he has been acting under Lucius's instructions, looking for the key to Karna Masta's power.
As Tilith and the Summoner approach Aldahlia, where the Beast God Afla Dilith awaits, she starts feeling a bit sentimental.
Once the Summoner learns in Ogurono Desert that Afla Dilith has assimilated a castle, Eriole mentions that his plans include its infiltration as well.
Grahdens, who was waiting for Tilith and the Summoner at the Great Temple Eveneze, asks about their plans after the Four Fallen Gods are defeated.
Karl reminisces in Unarva Forest about the first time the Summoner passed through the gate. However, Seria turns up right in the middle of it all...
Paris is curious about the Summoner's future plans while in Aldahlia of the Rain. Lugina then makes an appearance, once again chastising her behavior.
The Dark Figure shows itself in the Pilgrimage Path. It states that it is crucial to know the correct path to take after defeating the Fallen Gods.
The Summoner must now head towards the castle via La Grenna Deadlands. Everyone trusts that the Summoner can find the real Afla Dilith within it.
In the Wolf's Lair, Tilith thanks the Summoner for having come this far. She opens a clean path to move forward while she serves as a distraction.
Everyone rejoices at the defeat of Afla Dilith. However, Eriole and his crew disclose that they plan to plunge the Randall Empire into chaos.
The Summoner and friends arrive to Atharva with the intention of stopping Eriole's rebellion. Karl seems at a loss on how to change Eriole's mind...
The Dark Figure makes an appearance at Ghost Town Ornea. He says Eriole can be found in the Crystal Palace, where he is preparing for battle.
Paris has been expecting everyone at the Great Argant Desert. She warns that she will have to stop them at any cost if they plan to go any further.
At the Great Argant Desert, Paris tells the Summoners about the world's current disarray. She claims that a strong leader is needed to guide the way.
Tesla shows herself at Ekmet River. She warns against any interference with Eriole's plans, claiming that the Summoner cannot change the world.
Grahdens visits the Great Forest Nalmea wondering if the Summoner is prepared to face Eriole. He then proceeds to reveal Eriole and Tesla's sad past.
The Summoner party tries to pass Mt. Granakia, but Paris shows up leading a troop of knights. A hot battle ensues shortly after...
Still in Mt. Granakia, Tesla arrives to declare the defeated Paris as useless. Paris is left speechless while Seria and the others try to comfort her.
After reaching Amuris Cemetery, Paris decides that she must ask Eriole directly about what's happening. She begs the Summoner to lead her to him.
Once in the Crystal Palace, Eriole reveals that he has no need for nobility in his new utopia. He then flees to the depths of the fortress.
The Dark Figure arrives to stop Eriole on his tracks. His real identity is revealed, and just when he tries to get rid of everyone, someone appears...
Following what Tilith had mentioned, the Summoner party visits Bariura. Ark then shows himself to say Lucius awaits in the Grand Gaia Crater.
Crossing the Ancient Dragon's Wood, the Summoner party begins to consider what they should ask Lucius when they meet. Time is running out.
Trekking the Boruk Blazing Dunes, the party meets Tilith, who demands they return to Elgaia. As a disciple, she cannot allow them to go any further.
Tilith breaks down at the Boruk Blazing Dunes, unable to fight against the Summoners. Remembering their travels together, she had tried to stop them.
Ark hints at the possibility of humanity's destruction at Scarlet River Laorkia. He hopes to test the party's strength at the Tower of the Oracle.
Revealing that he was once human, the party still doubts Ark. Tilith tries to explain the god-disciple relationship at Deserted Town Yuufim, but...
At the Tower of the Oracle, Ark means to test the power of those who serve the gods, versus that of those who oppose them. A brutal battle ensues.
After fighting at the Tower of the Oracle, Ark explains the true meaning of Summoning. Determined, he challenges the party to meet him at the Capital.
When meeting Ark at the Imperial Capital, he takes off his mask with determination. He tells of his past, revealing he is against Lucius as well.
In Sacred Mt. Bari, the party learns that Lucius is the only one who can control the gate. However, Tilith doesn't seem so sure of this.
Lucius sends strong minions after the party in the Grand Gaia Crater. Karl and the others will deal with them while the Summoner and Tilith advance.
The battle with Lucius is over. However, the calamities that lay within the seal have been unleashed. At that moment, Tilith makes a crucial choice.
The Summoner begins reconnaissance in Ishgria. Grahdens assigns a new member of Summoners' Hall to help with the mission, but...
Grahdens's new aide, who is none other than Paris, meets the Summoner at the Forgotten Ruins. She explains the details of the Ishgria mission.
The sight of the Lava Bridges brings Paris's mood down when suddenly a demon calling itself Shusui, the War Demon, appears and attacks the party.
After Shusui realizes that the Summoner's power is not ordinary, he tells the party to head towards the Soaring Tree Tower, past the Lava Bridges.
At Hogun Acid Cascades, Paris explains why she joined Summoners' Hall. She says she wants to change the Randall Empire from the outside, not inside.
While in Farv Miasma Forest, Paris discloses that Karl and Seria had left for Ishgria in advance. She also says Lugina was with Seria at the time...
Grahdens shows up at Thunder Grotto Yuuram after the party faces a setback. Apparently, the First Summoner, Owen, is on his way to Ishgria.
Paris sheds light on Elgaia's situation while at the Piercing Light Tower. She warns the Summoner not to get manipulated by the Elgaia Federation.
Paris seems very excited to visit a fabled place as the Poisonous Bug Forest. Apparently, she likes doing studying old legends and myths.
The Summoner's party finally reaches the Soaring Tree Tower. Shusui says he will be waiting at the top, and sends his minions to slow the group down.
Claiming he will guide the Summoner, Shusui discloses that there are 8 great demons, including himself. He says the Summoner must face them all.
Paris and the Summoner have arrived to Lem, the region past Celgrad. Paris seems worried about Karl, Seria, and maybe one other person?
Grahdens meets the Summoner and Paris at the Jimug Lava Caverns with some bad news. They now must find Seria and Lugina as fast as possible.
At Baraku Wetlands a goddess by the name of Mora shows herself. Claiming to have been previously sealed by Lucius, she speaks of the demons of Lem.
While in Vordo Primeval Forest, the Summoner asks Mora about Seria and Lugina's whereabouts. However, there's no word about Karl.
The great bones of the Fossilized Dragon are scattered everywhere. As the Summoner's party passes through this area, Paris's interest peaks.
Paris is so curious about the Lem Shrine Ruins, that she decides to go off on her own. However, this isn't very like her...
At the Lem Shrine Ruins, Mora's attitude changes very suddenly, ultimately attacking the Summoner. But to what end?
Trapped in the darkness of the Lem Shrine Ruins, the Summoner reunites with Seria and Lugina. But who will come to their rescue?
While in the Dark Sierra Oritira, neither Seria nor Lugina are very happy to be reunited. Paris explains Mora's charade, and the situation at hand.
At the Bridge of Despair the party learns that Mora is the demon who rules over Lem. Each member must now work to overcome the demon's traps.
Ridiculing the Summoners on the Bridge of Despair, Mora discloses some critical information about the demons of Ishgria, and promptly flees.
Led by Tilith, the Summoner arrives to Beiorg. Paris claims Tilith scolded her for selfishly advancing on her own, but...
Though they manage to avert any further danger thanks to Tilith,  Lugina reveals he's not happy about Mora's trickery while at Moldia Lava Road.
At the Crimson Beach Shurin, the Summoner learns Beiorg is not ruled by a demon, but Mora seems to want the Summoner to eliminate whatever does.
Within Reis's Lab Ruins, Paris is consumed by curiosity over the documents left behind by the creator of the Six Armors. Lugina seems interested too.
Moments after entering the Windmill Garden, a loud and strange sound is heard, and the Summoner is suddenly attacked.
Seria arrives just in time to help the Summoner in the Windmill Garden. Paris and Lugina arrive later with new information for the team.
While in the Ancient City Maldoor, a deafening sound is heard, and Beiorg attacks the Summoner yet again. However, he seems stronger than before.
Mora shows up at the Ancient City Maldoor bringing information on Beiorg and Karl. But how do the Summoners react to this?
Grahdens suddenly appears at the Endless Staircase to tell the Summoner party that Owen seems to be missing. He entrusts Karl to them, and leaves.
The Summoner party successfully infiltrates Beiorg Castle, and begins searching for the castle's power source. However, an alarm goes off and...
Karl has somehow made it into Beiorg Castle to deliver the final blow on Beiorg. This stops Beiorg on his tracks, but...
瘴気を放つ巨大な花の咲く地ウルジについて語るパリス。カルのことを気にしつつも、召喚師は次の目的地を目指す。
【無限炎都ガーム】ガームに着いた召喚師を待ち受けていたのは満身創痍のセリアとルジーナ、そして最初の召喚師だった。
【無限炎都ガーム】突然襲い掛かってきたオーンの攻撃をなんとかしのいだ召喚師。しかし、オーンからはさらに厳しい言葉が。
【ウルジ廃棄沼】オーンに怯えながら魔神を探す召喚師たち。ルジーナとセリアは、パリスにオーンの恐ろしさを伝える。
【瘴狂花ウルジ】巨大な花の近くに一際異様な姿を発見した召喚師たち。魔神の可能性を考慮し、それを目指して進むことに。
【瘴狂花ウルジ】急な落石により敵を逃がしてしまう。そこへ現れたモーラが、先程の敵がこの地を支配する魔神だと告げる。
【アヴォル雷光橋】魔神メロードを取り逃がしたことをオーンに叱責される召喚師たち。そこへ謎の男が現れオーンを挑発する。
【堕ちし神徒の館】メロードがかつて住んでいた館で召喚師はカルと再会する。しかし、カルは話をするとすぐに去ってしまう。
【魔晶窟フェイグ】オーンに戦いを挑んだ男が召喚師たちの前に姿を現す。彼は召喚老への恨みを持つ者のようだが…。
【廃城ビオラデ】廃城でグラデンスと再会する召喚師たち。グラデンスはカルの無事を知ると、無事ならそれでいいと言った。
【廃城ビオラデ】メロードを倒した一行の前に２人の召喚老が現れるが、そこに謎の男が現れる。その者を見たグラデンスは…。
モーラが現れ、召喚師に、この地を支配する魔神の情報をもたらす。その魔神はエルガイア侵攻を計画しているというが…。
【ガドウム溶鉱炉】召喚師が仲間たちに合流すると、重苦しい雰囲気に満ちていた。その原因は２人の召喚老にあった。
【ファールン光河】いつものように口論を始めるセリアとルジーナ。しかし、オーンの圧力で黙って先を急ぐことになる。
【シーグス植物園】落石の罠により個別に行動することにする一行。召喚師の前にカルが現れ、召喚院について語る。
【廃棄物処分場ギモ】召喚師の前に現れた不気味な男は自分がミーファであることを認め、召喚師に戦いを挑む。
【廃棄物処分場ギモ】召喚師を認め、過去に起きたことを話すミーファ。そして、そこへグラデンスが合流する。
SCENARIO_NAME: ミーファとグラデンス

DESCRIPTION: 【光都ラクシュルト】グラデンスとカルが再会する。２人は互いに信頼した上で、今は道が異なることを確認する。
【光都地下街】再び召喚師に語りかけるミーファ。いずれ真実を語ると言い残すと、召喚老への恨みとともに去って行った。
【気象管理塔】自らの配下になるよう迫る魔神モルデリム。しかし、召喚師たちは当然それを拒否し、戦いに臨む。
【気象管理塔】モルデリムを倒した召喚師の元にパリスらが駆けつける。そこへエルガイア連邦のベルツと名乗る男が現れ…。
ティリスは召喚師を新たな地ザームブルグへと導く。そこにはこの地を支配する魔神アム＝ユノスが待ち受けており…。
【ビヴォーグ溶岩道】パリスとセリアがルジーナの行方がわからなくなっていると告げる。状況が状況なだけに不安がよぎる。
【イルグス赤銅浜】モーラが、この地を支配する魔神について語る。セリアはモーラについて何か感じるところがあったようだ。
【夕闇森に沈む遺跡】カルは自身の目的と、それをなかなか告げられなかった理由、魔神の血を引くことを打ち明ける。
SCENARIO_NAME: イシュグリアに眠る力

DESCRIPTION: 【雷渓谷ラーダ】グラデンスは召喚院の目的を告げる前に、カルナ・マスタと戦う意志があるかと召喚師たちに問いかける。
SCENARIO_NAME: カルナ・マスタについて

DESCRIPTION: 【絶望の城カイオン】グラデンスは召喚院設立の理由を語る。神々から人を独立させるために、カルナ・マスタを倒すという。
【大巨人の亡骸】カルナ・マスタ封印のいきさつを語るモーラ。彼女がティリス救出の障害となるかをセリアは問いかけた。
SCENARIO_NAME: カルナ・マスタの封印

DESCRIPTION: 【アム＝ユノスの塔】召喚師に気軽に戦いを挑むアム＝ユノス。一見召喚師を侮っているようにも見えるが、どうも様子が違う。
【アム＝ユノスの塔】アム＝ユノスは愉快そうに消えていった。そこへ現れたミーファとオーンの戦いに召喚師は巻き込まれる。
【アム＝ユノスの塔】召喚師とともにオーンと戦い勝利したミーファはカルナ・マスタの力が封印された地について話し始める。
ティリスの力でファル・ナーガに到達した召喚師たち。しかし、パリスは何か悩んでいることがあるようだが……。
【豪炎竜の咆哮】素直に悩みを打ち明けるパリス。自身に不足しているものが何なのか、パリスは考え続けているようだ。
【豪炎竜の咆哮】襲い掛かってきたのはこの地を支配する魔神の配下のようだ。彼は主の邪魔をするなと警告して去ってゆく。
【水竜都トレーヴ】カルはこの地を支配する魔神バリュオンの息子として、自身が成そうとしていることを召喚師に語る。
【イレーシア平原】召喚師一行の前に現れたモーラは、セリアの言葉から何かを感じ取り、自らの進む道を選び取ったようだ。
【マハラーダ砦】セリアの励ましを受けてなお悩むパリスは、召喚師に胸の内を明かすが、まだ迷いがあるようだ。
【光竜都シン】召喚師と戦うために力を解放するカル。しかし、迷いが残っているためか、それは中途半端な覚醒だった。
【光竜都シン】自分の迷いを認めたカルは召喚師と戦うことをやめた。今後の行動を決めるため、ともに霊峰ナーガへ向かう。
【神喰蜘蛛の巣】ベルツとルジーナが現れカルナ・マスタ復活の危険性を説く。ルジーナは召喚師と戦いたいようだが……。
【神喰蜘蛛の巣】召喚師の力を再確認したルジーナはカルナ・マスタ復活の阻止を諦め、再び召喚師と同行することに決める。
【霊峰ナーガ】父親を説得しようとするカルだったが、バリュオンは魔神ならば力で示せと言って相手にしようとはしない。
【霊峰ナーガ】バリュオンとの戦いの中、突如現れたモーラはその力を取り込んでしまう。彼女が一行に向けた言葉とは？
モーラの力に不安を感じるティリスに送られ、酷寒のエストリアへと辿りついた。セリアはモーラと本音で話をしたいと語る。
【海上油田アデル】モーラはエストリアの地について語り、自らの目的を明かすと、雪原で待つと言って去って行った。
【白迷雪原ジグ】召喚師たちが自分の提案を拒否すると、モーラは用意していた罠を起動し、召喚師へと襲い掛かってきた。
【白迷雪原ジグ】モーラはカルナ・マスタを封じた魔神の力を集め、封印の地メノンへと向かうことを告げる。
【氷樹林スーソリア】モーラの策謀について話す一行。今はモーラの思惑通りに動いた上で、最後にそれを覆すしかない。
【服従の機巧門】シュスイとの戦いが避けられぬことを予測する一行。ルジーナたちはその役目を召喚師に押し付けようとする。
【服従の機巧門】召喚師たちの前に現れたシュスイは傷だらけであった。シュスイは召喚師を指名して戦いを挑む。
【服従の機巧門】敗れたシュスイは自らモーラに力を渡すと、召喚師にこれから先に待つ最強の座を得るよう言い残して消えた。
【ナヴォア射光洞】魔神の力の制御について悩むカル。そこへベルツがエルガイアの現状を伝えに現れた。
【オライム断氷壁】カルは恥じねばならぬと嘆くリオメルグ。ルジーナもカルの精神的な弱さについて言及する。
【魔皇城エストリア】罠の張り巡らされた城内についてルジーナの作戦を聞く一行。それぞれの役目を果たすため攻略が始まる。
【魔皇城エストリア】罠が発動し対処のためルジーナ、パリス、カルは別行動となる。そこへ現れたモーラに対して……。
SCENARIO_NAME: モーラとセリアの対話

DESCRIPTION: 【魔皇城エストリア】取り込んだ魔神たちの力を発揮したモーラにより仲間たちは倒れた。しかし、そこにティリスが現れた。
【魔皇城エストリア】ティリスとの再会を喜ぶ一行。しかし、そこに倒したはずのモーラが現れて……。
カルナ・マスタの封じられた地メノンへと進む召喚師は、仲間たちとともに最後の困難へと立ち向かう決意を固めた。
【八魔封神門】いつもの調子の一同の前にカロンが現れる。カロンは召喚師たちの意志を確認すると、門を開いて去って行った。
【ヒュードラ間欠泉】アーク、ベルツ、リオメルグといった懸念すべき者たちの動きがないことに対し、ルジーナはいぶかしむ。
【ヒュードラ間欠泉】アークはかつての仲間たちのため、そして大切な者の決意を守るため、召喚師の前に立ち塞がる。
SCENARIO_NAME: アークの守るべきもの

DESCRIPTION: 【ヒュードラ間欠泉】一行の前にオーンとグラデンスが満身創痍の姿で現れる。カルナ・マスタに挑み、撤退したというが…。
【獣人遺跡ラザ】大神皇を倒せば召喚術はどうなるかとベルツが疑問を投げかける。そして、リオメルグは彼に協力するようだ。
【雷塚パダム】アークを退けたことを驚いたカロンは、カルナ・マスタに挑むべき者かを確かめるため、召喚師との戦いを望む。
【雷塚パダム】召喚師とその仲間たちを希望と認めたカロンは、神託の巫女が今どのような状態にあるのかを語り始めた。
【希望の光城】カロンから託されたイリアの言葉をアークへ伝える。しかしアークは仲間たちの想いを無駄にはできないと言う。
【希望の光城】アークはイリアを諦めるつもりは無く、彼女を助けるために、召喚師たちに力を貸すことを約束した。
【呪怨街エグメオン】アークを加え、オーン、グラデンスと合流した一行は、召喚術が消えてしまった場合のことを話し合う。
【虚空封界メノン】大神皇を討つための作戦を話し合う中、封印が解かれたことを知った魔神たちがメノンへと殺到する。
【虚空封界メノン】アークがイリアを呼び起こすまでの時間を稼ぐため、召喚師は遂にカルナ・マスタと対峙することになる。
【虚空封界メノン】カルナ・マスタの強大な力の前に窮地に陥った召喚師とアーク。２人が最後をむかえようとしたその時…。
【虚空封界メノン】イリアの残した力は予想より小さくなっていた。自分の力に近いと感じたティリスは、その力の増幅を図る。
【虚空封界メノン】カルナ・マスタを倒した一行だったが、その最後の攻撃を受けたティリスは瀕死の状態だった……。
カルナ・マスタの魂が封じられた地ミルドランに足を踏み入れた召喚師たち。海に行きたかったティリスは困惑するが…。
【崩落異都ゼラ】イリアを救うため、この地を訪れたアーク。召喚師とティリスは彼と合流し、その協力をすることに。
【崩落異都ゼラ】過去の弱さと向き合い、先を見据えるアーク。かけがえのない仲間たちの想いを胸に、騎士はなおも行く。
【崩壊廃都フーヴェ】故郷にて療養中のモーラと遭遇した一行。あわや一触即発かと思われたが、事態は意外な方向へと進み…。
【崩壊廃都フーヴェ】かつて黒の隠者として利用した者たちとの邂逅により、アークは激しい自責の念に駆られるが…。
【浮遊城ミルドラン】現れたメロードの言葉より、次に現れる相手が誰なのか理解したアークは、己１人で戦うことを決意する。
【浮遊城ミルドラン】召喚師たちの協力を仰ぎ、再び六英雄に挑むアーク。激昂するメロードの前には、カロンが立ち塞がる。
【浮遊城ミルドラン】六英雄を撃破するアークたち。一方、カロンとメロードは、ともに深い眠りについていく。
【悠久神殿】封印を斬り裂いて、神託の騎士と巫女は再び巡りあう。そしてカルナ・マスタとの最後の戦いが始まる…！！
【悠久神殿】カルナ・マスタを完全に倒す召喚師たち。アークとイリアは限りある日々の中で幸せになると告げ、去っていく…。
【隠者の館】戦いを終え、イリアと平穏な時を過ごすアーク。だが彼の魂は、まだ完全に過去と決別できてはいなかった……。
【隠者の館】ようやく過去との決別を果たすアーク。そしてそれを笑顔で迎えるイリア。２人は召喚師にある結晶を渡す。
連絡を受けて召喚院を訪れた召喚師とティリス。２人はルジーナが消息を絶ったという異界「ベクタス」に向かうことに…。
異界「ベクタス」に降り立つ召喚師とティリス。ルジーナ捜索の任を帯びてはいるが、ティリスは初めての異界に興味津々で…。
【灰雲鉄街】グランガイアとは全く異なる技術の発達した世界に目を見張るティリス。そこで２人は謎の敵に囲まれてしまう。
【灰雲鉄街】ルジーナの部下、レダと合流できた召喚師。レダはルジーナ捜索は不要と告げ、ベクタス調査への協力を求める。
【セルザ工廠】レダからベクタスの情報を得た召喚師。この世界は現在謎の地震が頻発し、崩壊へと向かっているらしい。
【壊材廃場】召喚師たちを尾行する機械人形と遭遇。言葉の通じるこの機械人形はどうやら相棒の救助を依頼したいらしい。
【壊材廃場】助けた機械人形から情報管理塔という場所のことを聞き出した一行は、ベクタス調査を進めるためにそこを目指す。
【機電都市メルサス】機械人形らから求められて“マスター”となった召喚師たち。レダが彼らに授けたもう１つの名前は……。
【機電都市メルサス】情報管理塔を目指して都市を進む召喚師たちの前に、突如として巨大な機械人形が現れる……。
【機電都市メルサス】襲撃してきた謎の機械人形をなんとか撃退する召喚師たち。すると、なぜか召喚の力がわずかに戻る。
【情報管理塔】ティリスの操作で、機械から何者かの会話の音が流れる。それを聞いたレダは我を忘れて操作に熱中して……。
【ゾリダス山地】ベルツと遭遇する一行。レダはベルツに対して剣呑な態度を見せ、アベル機関に出し抜かれぬよう先を急ぐ。
【機神高郭】地震の震源だと思われる施設を進む召喚師たち。だが、その前にメルサスで襲ってきた謎の機械人形が再び現れる。
【機神高郭】謎の機械人形の圧倒的な力の前に、召喚師たちが窮地に陥る中、壁を破ってある男が現れる。その男とは……。
【機神高郭】撃破後、すぐに復活して退去する封神機。ルジーナは召喚師らに、あの機体のこと、そして現在の状況を説明する。
【ミセルス祀殿】道中で発見した建物を訪れるレダら。ハチとタルによると、かつてのマスターの遺物が保管された場所らしい。
【ミセルス祀殿】何かを守るようにしていた機械人形を撃退。すると祭壇より、何者かの言葉が途切れ途切れで聞こえてきて…。
新たに封神儀の存在が観測された異界「ヴィランシル」に降り立つ召喚師たち。そこは雪と氷に覆われた世界だった……。
【バリウラ湖城】ルジーナよりこの世界の探索を任された召喚師たち。とりあえずは目の前にある城から調べることに……。
【バリウラ湖城】城内で、バリウラ皇族の末裔である老婆とその孫娘と遭遇する。２人よりこの世界の状況を聞くが……。
【城前朽街】バリウラ帝国の伝承は、この世界ではおとぎ話のような扱いだが、リアナの姉ルチアナだけは信じていたという。
【風雪深林】リアナの姉ルチアナと邂逅した召喚師たち。親しく接しようとするティリスだが、彼女はそれを激しく拒絶して…。
【風雪深林】神狼のもとへ向かうには、この先の２ヶ所の祠で儀式する必要があるらしい。レダは二手に別れることを提案する。
【ラウジス寒湖】神に対する恐れを正直に告白するリアナ。ティリスは彼女に、神と人間の関係についての悩みを吐露する。
【幻楼雪原】神々への不信感を口にするルチアナ。レダはそんな彼女に、グランガイア、エルガイアの歴史を語って聞かせる。
【零壁の密道】再会した姉妹だが、対話は平行線に。そんな中、封神儀と思われる巨大な狼が一行の前に現れる……！！
【零壁の密道】突如戦いに乱入した神狼。その言葉により、これこそが封神儀だと判明するが、何やら様子がおかしく……。
【ガルム砕氷帯】雪原に佇む少女と遭遇する召喚師たち。彼女はこちらの姿を見るや、問答無用で攻撃を仕掛けてきて……。
【ガルム砕氷帯】少女との戦闘はある男性によって制止される。レダによると、彼らはアベル機関の精鋭らしいが……。
【神狼極域】極域に辿り着いた一行。神狼との対峙を前にして怯えた表情を見せるリアナに、ティリスは心配して声を掛ける。
【神狼極域】神狼に呼びかけるリアナだが、その声は通じず、ルチアナ共々窮地に陥ってしまう。２人を救ったのは……。
SCENARIO_NAME: 人とか神とか関係なく

DESCRIPTION: 【神狼極域】激戦の末、本来の状態に戻った封神狼は、召喚師たちには情報を、リアナには言葉を残し、その場を去る。
【封獣の獄処】ネーレによりバリウラ湖城の地下に呼び出された召喚師は、そこに封印されている魔獣の討伐を依頼される。
【封獣の獄処】ネーレが語るバリウラ帝国最後の戦い……。そして召喚師には、魔獣討伐の報酬として皇族用の鎌が譲られる。
【慈栄聖領】自分しか知らぬ聖領に召喚師を迎え入れた封神狼は自らを解放した礼として本来の封神儀の力での戦いを申し出る。
【慈栄聖領】召喚師の力を認めた封神狼は、その行く末を楽しみにしながら、再びこの世界を守護する役目へと戻っていく。
SCENARIO_NAME: ヴィランシルの守護神

DESCRIPTION: 封神儀探索のため、新たな世界「凰刃那原」を訪れた召喚師。そこで待っていたのは、なんと修行を終えたセリアだった。
【碧陽の竹道】ティリスと合流した召喚師とセリア。レダは他の世界へ赴き、ハチとタルはノエルの手伝いを行っているらしい。
【碧陽の竹道】黒ずくめの集団に襲われる女性を発見した召喚師たち。集団は召喚師たちにも問答無用で襲い掛かってきた。
【碧陽の竹道】襲われていた女性スズネを無事助け出した召喚師たちは、とりあえず彼女とともに安全な場所に移ることに。
【沃涼田園】スズネの家臣サクノシンと合流する召喚師たち。だがそこにスズネを狙うカゲヌイが現れ、戦闘に……！！
【沃涼田園】カゲヌイを撃退した召喚師たちは、スズネの正体、そして彼女が置かれている状況を聞き、手助けをすることに。
【禍戦ヶ原】戦場跡の惨憺たる光景に愕然とするスズネ。そこには、戦いで倒れた者たちを笛の音で弔う謎の男もいた……。
【護領関】警備の手薄な関所を抜けようとするが、ゲンバが手下たちと待ち構えていた。逃げることもできずに戦端が開かれる。
【護領関】スズネを人質に取られてしまい、拘束されてしまう召喚師たち。万事休すかと思われたその時、思わぬ助けが……！
【州街の大橋】城を目指す召喚師たちの前に、ゲンバに仕える剣士ラカが出現。彼女はなぜか封神儀のことを知っており……。
【州街の大橋】謎の術で召喚師たちを圧倒するラカ。彼女は「探しているものはすぐ近くにある」と告げて、その場を後にする。
【高阻の城壁】城の敷地内へ侵入を果たした召喚師たちは、ゲンバより城の警備を任されているカゲヌイの奇襲を受ける。
【高阻の城壁】執拗に足止めを図るカゲヌイに手を焼く召喚師たち。そこに再度謎の男が現れ、カゲヌイの相手を買って出る。
【千畳御殿】ようやくスズネのもとへたどり着いた召喚師たち。待ち構えていたゲンバと、追ってきたカゲヌイに戦いを挑む！！
【千畳御殿】神凰を宿し、ゲンバを操っていたラカは、凰絶威で召喚師たちを拘束。その状況を打破したのはなんと……。
【妖凰天守】召喚師とセリア、そしてサクノシンはスズネをティリスに任せてラカとの決戦のために城の屋上天辺を目指す。
【妖凰天守】サクノシンの失態によりセリアは身動きが取れなくなる。召喚師は封神儀と対峙するため1人でラカの元へ向かう。
【妖凰天守】召喚師により倒されるラカ。彼女は自身が宿している神凰が混沌と破壊を司る存在だと告げ、その姿を出現させる。
SCENARIO_NAME: 混沌と破壊を司るモノ

DESCRIPTION: 【妖凰天守】神凰の撃破に成功した召喚師。一方、死を望むゲンバに対し、スズネは主君としての権利と義務を果たすことに。
【機武の廃寺】夜な夜な怪物が出るという寺の調査に赴く召喚師たち。サクノシンはその寺にまつわる怪談を語るが……。
【機武の廃寺】怪物の正体だった機械人形を停止させる召喚師たち。またカゲヌイにより先の怪談が作り話だと判明するが……。
【寂寞の野原】ミョウケイに呼び出された召喚師。スズネの元教育係であり、忍術の達人でもある彼は召喚師との腕比べを望む。
【寂寞の野原】ミョウケイとの戦いに勝利し、彼を満足させた召喚師は優れた名匠によって打たれた素晴らしい刀を贈られる。
新たに封神儀の反応を感知した異界ロッカザルムに足を踏み入れた召喚師。そこで待っていたのは、なんとグラデンスだった。
【遠望の高地】ティリス、セリアたちと合流した召喚師。グラデンスより、暴走状態の封神儀があと２つだと知らされる。
【巨虚古跡】人間のものと比べて大きすぎる遺跡に疑問を抱く一行。その答えを暗示するかのような巨大な魔動人形を目撃する。
【巨虚古跡】隠れて進んでいた召喚師たちを、徘徊していた魔動人形が発見。明らかに敵意を持って襲い掛かってくる。
【巨虚古跡】魔動人形の予想外の強さに苦戦する召喚師たち。だが魔動人形の攻撃により遺跡が崩壊。その隙に先に進むが……。
【アンカシュ湿跡】辛くも魔動人形からの逃亡に成功した召喚師たち。魔動人形と再度遭遇することを想定し慎重に進むことに。
【アンカシュ湿跡】レダと再会した一行は、魔動人形を倒すためにアベル機関のギャレット、メルと一時共闘することに。
【アンカシュ湿跡】なんとか魔動人形を撃破する召喚師たち。その直後、アベル機関の２人と一触即発の状態になるが……。
【掌流瀑布】レダはこの世界そのものが封神儀だと推測。一行はとりあえず、封神儀の反応が強い高地を目指して進むことに。
【掌流瀑布】先行していたグラデンスに追い着く召喚師たち。グラデンスは、自分とアベル機関長官ラナスの関係を語る。
【厳塊の峡壁】アベル機関と遭遇し、戦いに発展しかける召喚師たち。だが、そこに復活した魔動人形が乱入してくる……！！
【厳塊の峡壁】魔動人形を撃破するが、再び復活の兆しが……。召喚師たちはグラデンスと別れ、封神儀捜索を進めることに。
【神兜殿】召喚師一行の前に姿を見せるベルツ。さらに彼を追ってルジーナも出現。ベルツ自身の目的を明かすよう詰め寄る。
【鎧核廊】封神鎧の核があると思われる遺跡中心部に入る召喚師たち。ラナスたちを警戒し、慎重に、そして急いで進むが……。
【鎧核廊】メルの不意打ちを予期し、防ぐレダ。だがギャレットも現れ、召喚院とアベル機関の正面衝突が勃発する……！！
【鎧核廊】後から現れたグラデンスがギャレットとメルを襲撃。その隙に召喚師たちはラナスを追って封神鎧の核のもとへ急ぐ。
【鎧核廊】封神鎧の核の前でラナスを発見。ラナスの行動を阻止しようとする召喚師たちだが、そこへ魔動人形が再び出現する！
【鎧核廊】封神鎧の核を破壊して、封神の力を手にするラナス。だがその直後、思わぬ者がその力を彼より強奪する……。
【崩柱の墓群】グラデンスと封神儀の反応があった地域を探索する召喚師。だが、そこへ多数の魔動人形たちが突如出現する。
SCENARIO_NAME: ロッカザルムの追加調査

DESCRIPTION: 【崩柱の墓群】魔動人形の包囲を突破した召喚師とグラデンス。レダによると、ここは役目を終えた魔動人形が眠る場所らしい。
最後の封神儀を求めティリス、セリアとヴァルドロアに足を踏み入れる召喚師。どうやらカルが先行し調査を行っているらしい。
【星降りの丘】カルと合流する召喚師たち。彼の話によるとここはドラゴンたちの祖となる存在などがいる“竜の世界”らしい。
【竜の炎墓】突如現れたカルナ・マスタを主と呼ぶ者たち。中でも雷気を纏った女は、召喚師に敵意を向け、戦いを挑んでくる。
【竜の炎墓】召喚師たちの前に現れた二神は、召喚術と封神儀の真実、そして封神竜に封じられた恐るべき存在のことを語る。
SCENARIO_NAME: 悌神皇アルザ・マスタ

DESCRIPTION: 【雷晶山】ルジーナとレダに遭遇した一行。情報交換を請われたルジーナは、ベルツ、そしてアベル機関の恐るべき目的を話す。
【雷晶山】召喚師らの前に現れたベルツ。簒神奪珠を渡すよう迫るカルに対し、戦うつもりがないので逃げると言ってのける。
【月影の鏡湖】封神鎧の力が近づいたことにより、神竜の寝床にいた封神竜が暴走。二神を振り切り、飛び出してしまう。
【月影の鏡湖】弱まった封神竜から真の召喚の力を得ようとするベルツ。だがその瞬間、彼の身体はラナスに貫かれる……。
【神樹海】オーン、グラデンスと邂逅する召喚師たち。グラデンスは、召喚院での自分たちとラナスの過去について語る。
【カーラル遺殿】オーン、グラデンスがラナスらと戦う場面に遭遇する一行。グラデンスの指示で、召喚師はオーンに加勢する。
【カーラル遺殿】オーンらの猛攻により劣勢に陥るラナス。だが不退転の覚悟で驚異的な力を発揮し、オーンに深手を負わせる。
【カーラル遺殿】ラナスはギャレットの意見を受け入れて撤退。傷ついたオーンは、ティリスの治療を拒んでいたが……。
【導星の暗洞】現在の状況を再確認する召喚師たち。この先、何があっても決して動じないよう覚悟を新たにする。
【神竜の寝所】進む先にカルナ・マスタの力を感じるティリス。アベル機関に追い付くため、召喚師たちは先を急ぐ。
【神竜の寝所】ニ神を退け、ついに封神竜より真の召喚の力を奪取したラナス。己の力の証明として、彼は召喚師に戦いを挑む。
【神竜の寝所】ラナスの身体を依代にし、顕現するアルザ・マスタ。凄まじい力を示し、召喚師たちを圧倒するが……。
【神竜の寝所】アルザ・マスタを滅ぼすことに成功した召喚師。脅威は去り、ティリスは召喚師との新たな旅に想いを馳せる。
【審決の神闘場】サートゥルスとラヴァルに呼び出された召喚師は、２人より今後の遺恨を残さないための戦いを望まれる。
【審決の神闘場】召喚師の力を認めたサートゥルスとラヴァルはグランガイアに戻らず、今後もヴァルドロアに残ると告げる。
【再臨の炉】カルナ・マスタの力に導かれ、隠された場所へ進む召喚師。そこには再臨の時を待つアルザ・マスタの姿があった。
【再臨の炉】兄神との破絆を望んだアルザ・マスタ。自身に与えられた「悌神皇」という名を否定し、その身を消滅させていく。
ウォーロンに呼び出されたグラデンスとオーンは、アベル機関とベルツの現状を知らされるとともに、ある計画を告げられる。
【崩序の草原】ギャレットとメルの抹殺命令を断り、グラデンスより新たな密命を受けた召喚師は、現地でルジーナと合流する。
【灰尽の森】ベルツがギャレットとメル相手に戦っているところに遭遇する召喚師たち。両者とも話の通じる状態ではなく……。
【灰尽の森】撤退するギャレットとメル。ルジーナと戦っていたベルツもまたこちらの言葉に耳を貸さず、彼らを追う。
SCENARIO_NAME: 追い詰められた者たち

DESCRIPTION: 【砕礫原野】ラナスの理想のため、封印された魔神の解放を目指すギャレット。メルは時間稼ぎのために召喚師らに戦いを挑む。
【砕礫原野】敗れたメルは、自分の傷を癒すティリスの行動に困惑する。ギャレットを追う召喚師らはメルを同行させることに。
【亡街ルーチェス】メルが造られた存在だと召喚師らに明かし、引き渡しを求めるベルツ。だが、ルジーナはそれを一蹴する。
【清憩の広場】魔神に破壊されたこの街が生まれ故郷だと明かしたベルツは、あらためてメルを引き渡すように告げるが……。
【葬魔の禁碑】ギャレットの仕掛けた罠を解除しながら進む召喚師たち。ベルツはメルに今後どう行動するのかを問う。
【葬魔の禁碑】復活した魔神はギャレットの命を吸収。メルもまた、ギャレットに言われたままに命を捧げようとするが……。
魔神は倒され、ベルツはメルに新たな未来を示す。そして数週間後、各勢力の若手トップは未来のためのある約束を交わす。
SCENARIO_NAME: 新たなる時代の幕開け

DESCRIPTION: グランガイア、イシュグリア、そして数多の異界を駆け抜けた暁の召喚師たち。彼らの冒険は終わらない。
Lin from the Survey Office Bureau asks the Summoner to investigate Egor Mountains. They say an ice demon lies dormant there.
Lin discusses Skramya's past. Legends say that the demon was sealed away by a hero after it tried to destroy the nation that wanted to manipulate it.
Lin asks the Summoner to survey Ignia Cavern. It seems that a demon has awoken there after the earthquakes in Cordelica...
The Summoner defeats the gigantic and uncontrollable demon. Lin sings the Summoner's praises, but her attitude changes completely all of the sudden...
Lin relays some information to the Summoner which states that Valmodora's Nest houses a demon within. She expects the Summoner to gather more details.
The Summoner defeats Valmodora while surveying the location. It seems that the ruins were housing something gigantic indeed.
The Summoner can feel a tremendous power emanating from the bottom of Golzo Underground Lake. Lin has a bad feeling about it, but asks for a survey.
Lagzal, who lay dormant underground, was a god who sought to destroy humans. It seems Lin was quite worried about the Summoner during the expedition.
While passing through the Agni Dungeon, Lin asks the Summoner to subdue a certain "evil being" locked up inside of it.
According to Lin, what had been locked inside was the ghost of a feared tyrant who was sealed away by his own retainers.
The Summoner goes underwater into Elnada Sea Temple to conduct a survey, while Lin is completely taken by the romantic legend of the sea god there...
Although scolded for talking too much, Lin tells the Summoner the details of the tragic story surrounding the sea god and his dear beloved.
A raging beast may be dwelling within Garnes Research Cave, so the Summoner surveys the place. Many details seem to be available about this mission...
After defeating the beast in Garnes Research Cave, the Summoner has a talk with Lin. However, the reception goes bad all of the sudden.
The Summoner goes to survey the Subterranean Cave. According to Lin, there was once a dark sorcerer who conducted experiments there...
The Summoner defeats the beast in the Subterranean Cave before receiving all pertaining information. Lin gets angry, saying that she was worried sick.
The Summoner meets Shusui in the depths of the Cave of Sealed Might. The demon claims to have been disturbed while sleeping, and attacks.
The Shusui the Summoner defeats in the Cave of Sealed Might turns out to be a "Shadow." The Shadow explains that a certain seal has begun to break.
In Lem's Cape of Sealed Ploys, the Summoner meets Mora once again. She immediately starts a fight, but...
The Mora the Summoner defeats at the Cape of Sealed Ploys turns out to be another "Shadow." What could she mean by an "obstructive power"?
Mora talks about the real demon named Beiorg in the Sealed Forest. How will things change after defeating these demonic Shadows?
Apparently, what the Six Armors were really protecting was the Sealed Forest. What will happen if more of these Shadows are defeated?
In the Sealed Crystal Cave, it was not Amu Yunos's Shadow who awaited you as you expected. The demon identifies himself as Kalon instead, and attacks.
When the Summoner defeats Amu Yunos's Shadow as it replaces Kalon in the Sealed Crystal Cave, Mirfah appears and wants to test his strength.
Mirfah seemed both frustrated and pleased at losing to the Summoner in the Sealed Crystal Cave. He asked for a rematch sometime, and then departed.
【封竜の海溝】カルナ・マスタを封印する魔神の一柱カロンの影は、召喚師とルジーナの力を認めて戦いに応じる。
【封竜の海溝】ルジーナと話す召喚師の前にパリスが現れる。パリスは迷いを振り払うために召喚師との戦いを望む。
SCENARIO_NAME: 迷いを振り払うために

DESCRIPTION: 【封竜の海溝】召喚師との戦いはパリスの心の迷いを晴らしたようだ。これからも召喚師と共に歩んでいくことを告げる。
【封覇の祭壇】祭壇へたどり着いた召喚師を待ち受けていたのは静かにたたずむセリアだった。
【封覇の祭壇】セリアの次に現れたのはカルだった。カルはバリュオンと向き合い、自分の心に決着をつけたいという。
【封覇の祭壇】自分が何者であるか。自分なりの答えを出したカルは内に眠る魔神の力をも制御可能とした。
Though the Summoner reaches the rank of Novice, Seria is not impressed. She claims a Novice is lower than the lowest ranking itself.
The Summoner quickly reaches the rank of Contender, which makes Seria suspicious. She thinks the Summoner is using connections to move up the ranks.
Though incredulous at first, now that the Summoner has become a Duelist, Seria knows it's serious. She claims anyone can reach that rank though.
The Summoner reaches the rank of Berserker, which makes an angry Seria exclaim that she hopes a monster crushes the new Berserker into pieces.
The Summoner becomes a Sage, which leads a docile Seria to apologize for her past behavior. However, in the end, she goes back to her usual self...
After the Summoner becomes a Guardian, Seria shows up playing the same broken record, and claiming to be way above the Summoner as far as ranks go.
The Summoner reaches the rank of Titan. Seria promises to fulfill a promise she made to herself if the Summoner ever catches up in rank with her.
The Summoner is finally acknowledged by Seria after reaching General. Seria then tells of a Novice Summoner she fought against long ago.
After the Summoner becomes a Master, Seria shows up in a hurry to congratulate the Summoner, but as always...
The Summoner is now an Archfiend, so Seria decides to move up the ranks even faster. If the Summoner surpasses her, she will answer any one question.
Seria reaches Archfiend, while the Summoner reaches Cherubim. She thinks they are both the same rank, so she makes small talk about battle, but...
The Summoner is complimented by Seria after becoming a Lord, but Seria warns about becoming consumed by one's own pride and power.
The Summoner reaches the rank of Apollo. Seria claims to  have a valid reason to fight in the Arena, but she refuses to disclose it...
While the Summoner is promoted to Phanes, Seria has reached the Eurynomos rank. She says once they are both the same rank, she'll say why she fights.
After the Summoner also becomes Eurynomos, Seria makes good on her promise to reveal the reason behind her battles in the Arena.
The Summoner is promoted to Emperor, but Seria is clear about the fact that she dislikes people who fight mindlessly just to win.
Seria warns that the Summoner's current tactics as a new Suppressor lead down the wrong path. She will stop the Summoner herself before that happens.
Though the Summoner has reached the title of Beam, Seria no longer fears for the Summoner's undoing. She starts to think everything was in her head.
The Summoner becomes a Barrager. Seria sheds light on her previous doubts by telling the story of a Summoner who was consumed by his own power.
While the Summoner tries to tell Seria about being promoted to Heavenly Judge, Karl shows up asking if they've seen Grahdens...
Just as Seria is congratulating the Summoner for reaching Gleaming God, Lugina appears and ruins the mood for everyone...
After reaching Dormant God, Lin comes to the Arena and says she trusts the Summoner. Just then, Seria starts acting a little funny...
The Summoner becomes an Original God and finds that Grahdens is running away from everyone. He claims everyone wants to celebrate his birthday, but...
Having reached the rank of Darkstalker, the Summoner and Seria have a chat. However, Karl shows up to talk about the first time he met Seria and...
The Summoner tells Karl about reaching the rank of Ouranos, while Karl tries to tell the story of how he met Seria again. However, Seria interrupts...
Karl tells the Summoner, who has just been promoted to the Phoebus rank, of his first impression of Seria, but she manages to interfere yet again.
The Summoner reaches the rank of Athena, and Seria opens up about how she met Karl. Now the reason she tried to avoid this talk becomes apparent...
Elise, the informant of the Demon Slayers, teaches the Summoner how missions work. She says Summoners should only take on missions they are ready for.
Elise asks the Summoner to subjugate the demon Reduhark. But a Summoner named Noah, who appears out of the blue, says he can take it on his own...
Angered that the Summoner defeated Reduhark before he could, Noah asks Elise to send him on missions that are actually worth his time.
The Summoner is asked to defeat Melion, and it seems Noah has accepted the same mission. Elise says Noah is a former commander of the Demon Slayers...
Noah goes berserk when he finds out that the Summoner has slayed Melion before him. Elder Owen is the one to stop the quarrel between the two.
Elise is unsure about the difficult mission Owen means to use to test the extent of the Summoner's power. But Noah is also aware of it...
The Summoner slays both beasts, escaping unscathed. Noah refuses to acknowledge this, and instead lashes out in anger at Owen.
A fuming Noah claims that this time the spoils of victory shall be his. However, Elise explains that there is more to Noah than meets the eye...
The Summoner's fight has reassured Noah of his innermost thoughts. Their rocky relationship begins to soften, very much to Elise's delight.
Elise worries about the Summoner as a mission asking for the powerful demon Mistzug's subjugation has arrived. Then Noah shows up acting very rude...
It seems that Noah has finally acknowledged the Summoner's abilities. Elise talks about Noah's past, explaining why he loathes other people.
Upon hearing the name "Yugreia," Noah changes drastically. Both him and the Summoner set out to destroy the enemy that once ruined Noah's life.
Things start getting strange as the Summoner and Noah go after Yugreia separately. Owen reports on the current situation amidst all the confusion.
With more frequent demonic appearances, Elise has her hands full. She then falls victim to Noah's frustration, as he has failed to defeat Yugreia...
Noah says he will go after Yugreia with the Summoner. Elise is happy with Noah's change of pace, since he may finally be getting ready to move on.
While chatting with Elise, a seriously injured Noah appears. He reveals what happened and entrusts the Summoner with destroying the demon responsible.
Noah vents about his regret in proving unable to defeat his bitter enemy. Seeing this, Elise starts to open up to him...
Elise tries to ease the tension between Noah and the Summoner, but ends up making the next Demon Slayer mission a competition between the two.
Noah admits his defeat, though surprised as to how much he has changed. Meanwhile, the Summoner is praised by Owen and prepares for the next battle.
Owen explains that the seals in Grand Gaia are breaking, and that many demons from Ishgria will soon start appearing. The real battle has just begun.
Elise grows happier as she sees the relationship between the Summoner and Noah grow. However, Noah claims they are no more than rivals...
Demons keep appearing from another world. Noah asks for the Summoner's help in defeating the demons' leader, Arkem.
The Summoners manage to beat Arkem. However, Noah realizes how much power he truly lacks after watching Owen on the battlefield.
The Grand Quest System has been completed! Lin seems very excited for this new Summoner support tool, explaining the great points about the system.
Noah and Rhynt add a new function to the Grand Quest System. Now one can experience things from the time of the great war with the gods...
Karl asks the Summoner for help with defeating a dragon. However, apparently the beast is quick to flee from danger.
The Summoners split up to go after the dragon. According to Karl, it couldn't have gone too far.
After Karl suspects that the tremor happening means the Summoner drove away the dragon, his resolve towards the mission strengthens.
Suspecting that the Summoner has fought away the dragon, Karl rejoices believing that now's their chance to corner it.
Seria has been chasing after the Summoner and Karl. After scolding the Summoner for "moving too slow," she decides to go ahead and slay the dragon.
The Summoner receives a message from Lin saying that Karl will be a little late to reach the rendezvous point at the Tower of Dark Clouds.
Karl opens a treasure chest. Apparently there are many treasures still left in these parts after the great war with the gods.
Karl advances on his own and faces the dragon. The dragon flees as expected, but doesn't get very far.
Karl chases the dragon after the Summoner has confronted it, but there are too many possibilities as to where it could've gone.
Karl finds the dragon's resting place, and blocks its entrance. The branches on the ground suggest its real nest may be in the Thunder Valley.
Karl runs into the dragon unexpectedly. He tries to chase after the escaping dragon, but he's suddenly attacked from out of nowhere...
Seria injures herself during a heated battle against the dragon. She tells the Summoner to stand back, but...
The Summoner decides that Seria's medical care takes priority over chasing after the dragon. Karl proposes they consider the mission complete for now.
Seria and the Summoner challenge the dragon. However, Karl is injured and cannot chase after the beast, so he proposes they report back for now.
Seria and the Summoner lose the dragon just when it was almost beaten. However, they receive some important information from Karl via Lin.
Just when the dragon is about to roar, Karl lands a finishing blow. Now that the mission has been completed, they head back home, but...
Lugina unexpectedly shows up and asks the Summoner to take on a mission together. They are to find the empress's hidden treasure.
The Summoner and Lugina split up and each take a different route towards the Great Tree of Life, while Paris follows a third route there.
Lin has some information about the empress for the Summoner. According to what is known about her today, she was a cold-blooded monarch...
The Summoner finds a treasure chest. A sound of what resembles the flick of a switch is heard, but nothing really happens...
After defeating a tough enemy, the Summoner finds a treasure chest. Inside is a stone fragment of some kind...
As Lugina continues on his path, he remembers that the empress's sorcerer was her closest confidant, almost like her brother. Maybe he made these...
After Lugina opens a treasure chest, a resounding rumble can be heard, as if something gigantic were in motion.
Lugina finds a cave blocked by an iron barred gate. At that very moment, paralyzing gas is released and the gate opens.
After defeating a tough enemy, Lugina finds a treasure chest. The only thing inside is a stone fragment, but...
As Paris reaches the Town in Ruins, she remembers a story that tells of the fearsome empress's nature.
Paris opens a treasure chest adorned with a three-headed dragon. What sounds like a switch being activated is heard, but nothing happens...
Paris finds a treasure chest with its seal already broken. Her guess is that Summoners' Hall has sent personnel to search for the treasure as well.
Paris manages to defeat a tough enemy, and earns the treasure chest guarded by the beast as her reward. Inside she finds a stone fragment of sorts.
The Summoner finally reaches the Great Tree of Life. There is no treasure to be found here, but words start appearing on the trunk of the Tree...
Lugina finally reaches the Great Tree of Life. There is no treasure to be found here, but words start appearing on the trunk of the Tree...
Paris finally reaches the Great Tree of Life. There is no treasure to be found here, but words start appearing on the trunk of the Tree...
The Summoner, Lugina, and Paris finally reach the Great Tree of Life. The three of them have brought their stone fragments, so the last trial begins.
The party manages to clear the last trial. However, the treasure hidden by the empress doesn't turn out to be what they were expecting...
Karl and Seria receive some intel about the demon Graham's whereabouts and ask the Summoner for help. Seria doesn't think it'll help much though.
The three Summoners approach Graham's location via separate routes. Seria states once again that the Summoner's help is unnecessary.
Graham approaches the Summoner in a courteous manner, and decides to test the Summoner's power after deeming the same an interesting enough opponent.
Whether he really means it or not, Graham claims the Summoner to be too much for him, and flees. He says there's someone else he wants to play with...
Graham scolds Karl for being late, and attacks him. Karl accepts Graham's challenge, though weary of his traps.
Graham congratulates Karl on his growth, as if mocking him, and quickly flees. Even if this is a trap, Karl is set on going after him.
Seria attacks Graham to avenge the comrades she's lost to his tricks. Graham says he knows nothing of it, claiming he usually kills countless humans.
Graham doesn't take Seria seriously, and leaves because he's supposedly bored. He challenges Seria to come after him.
The Summoners manage to corner Graham, but it all works in accordance to his plans. The party then falls straight into his trap...
The Summoner and Seria are blasted off to separate locations full of powerful monsters. They try to go after Graham while Grahdens finds Karl's lance.
Graham, who's supposed to be waiting at the Coliseum Ruins, suddenly appears. The Summoner is able to somehow repel his sneak attack, but...
Graham shows himself to a grumbling Seria. He proceeds to tell her he loves her, but his definition of love is quite the twisted one...
As Grahdens looks for Karl, Graham appears before him. Graham tries to provoke the Elder Summoner, but Grahdens counters by provoking him instead.
Grahdens helps the unconscious Karl. He teaches Karl about the true meaning behind trusting someone, and leaves the rest up to the young Summoner.
Karl makes his way to the Coliseum Ruins, where Graham awaits. However, he feels like something within him has to come to life all of the sudden...
The Summoner arrives to the Coliseum Ruins. Graham, who has been waiting, says he will get more serious now, and attacks suddenly.
Graham has supposedly been driven into a corner, but he manages to heal all his wounds in an instant and flees, leaving a terrible aura behind...
Seria arrives to the Coliseum Ruins. After Graham mocks her, he says he will be a bit harsher on her than usual...
Though Graham is supposedly cornered, he heals all his wounds in an instant. Seria tries to take him on again, but he manages to escape.
After Karl arrives to Graham's lair he waits for his comrades before making a move, believing they are already on their way to help him.
Graham is surprised that the Summoner, Karl, and Seria were all able to arrive at the same time. Claiming he won't go easy on them, he attacks!
Graham heals his own wounds, but Karl sees through his facade. The attacks they landed on Graham were indeed successful.
The Summoners defeat Graham, but it seems like the demon knew of Karl's origins. Sensing a presence, Karl moves on his own.
Karl follows the presence he felt and finds that Graham has survived somehow. The demon shows his true nature and comes after Karl!
Graham is defeated without revealing what he knows about Karl. As Karl leaves the area still clouded by doubt, Seria and the Summoner show up.
The Summoner receives an urgent call from Lin. She says that Seria has run off after the demon Algmos all by herself after having heard of a sighting.
After Lin discloses the location of the demon, she mentions that she has asked other Summoners to help out as well, so the Summoner should seek them.
The Summoner runs into Tilith by chance. After Tilith hears what Seria has done, she immediately agrees to go after her together.
The Summoner runs into Grahdens by coincidence. Grahdens tells of Seria's ties with the demon, and agrees to go after her with the Summoner.
The Summoner runs into Lugina. After Lugina mocks Seria's course of action, he agrees to go after her to make fun of her in person.
Tilith and the Summoner find Seria, who is confronting Algmos. Seria is bent on facing the demon alone, but...
Seria confronts Algmos. Grahdens and the Summoner ignore Seria's wish of fighting alone, and join the battle.
Lugina and the Summoner arrive just when Seria is about to confront Algmos, and join the fight without anyone asking them to.
As Tilith guards Seria from harm, she reminds her that there are people who worry about her now, in the present.
Algmos gets away. While Seria dwells in her past Grahdens advises her to embrace her pain, and to bear the responsibility of her burden.
Algmos escapes while Seria and Lugina argue. Seria is stumped by Lugina's sound reasoning, but...
Though worried about Tilith's physical state, Seria finally makes up her mind and asks the Summoner for help once again.
Persuaded by Grahdens's advice Seria decides to face Algmos not in order to gain retribution, but to finally let go of her past.
Without giving it a second thought, Seria declares that she's going after Algmos and asks Lugina for his help with the dangerous task.
Seria defeats Algmos and grows greatly as a person after pondering the meaning of Tilith's heartfelt message.
After defeating Algmos with Grahdens's help, Seria declares that she will no longer fear placing her trust in others.
Having defeated Algmos, Seria gives Lugina all the credit, and even thanks him for his assistance. When Lugina is subjected to this, he...
Grahdens speaks to the Summoner in the Imperial Capital Randall. Without giving away too many details, he asks the Summoner for help with something.
Grahdens's real purpose is to defeat the demon Mashreed, but before he can do that, the number of surrounding demons in the area must be contained.
Grahdens defeats a demon in the Windswept Town. He states that the fight hardly qualified as a warm up, as if his opponent had been a breeze.
Grahdens defeats a demon in the Inferno Forest. He states that the fight hardly qualified as a warm up, as if his opponent had been a breeze.
Grahdens defeats a demon in the Halcyon Plains. He states that the fight hardly qualified as a warm up, as if his opponent had been a breeze.
Grahdens defeats a demon in the Stormswept Metropolis. He states that the fight hardly qualified as a warm up, as if his opponent had been a breeze.
Grahdens's fighting instinct slowly returns to him. He can sense Mashreed's strong presence, and yet another powerful one in the area.
The Summoner defeats a demon in the Shadow Temple. Grahdens, who was lagging behind, states he needs more time to recover his fighting instinct.
Grahdens encounters an unexpectedly strong opponent. However, he deems it the perfect opponent to fully restore his fighting instinct.
The battle has ended and Grahdens has regained his pride as a Summoner. He vows to fight in the frontlines from now on as well.
The Summoner and Grahdens finally meet Mashreed. Grahdens challenges the demon to see if its strength truly lives up to its reputation.
Mashreed runs from Grahdens in the heat of battle. Grahdens is highly disappointed, but decides to go after it just in case...
Mashreed has changed its shape, becoming more intimidating than ever. Knowing the real fight is about to begin, Grahdens's fighting spirit swells.
Grahdens defeats Mashreed and encourages the Summoner, who is astonished by the power the Elder Summoner displayed, to head towards Ishgria.
Lin asks the Summoner to accompany her during a land survey in Elgaia. She says if the Summoner is around, she will have nothing to worry about.
Lin states that they must explore four areas to complete the survey, and that if she becomes unable to continue, the survey will be deemed a failure.
Lin's clothes are melted by the mucus secreted by a certain demon. Seeing herself in a pinch, she asks the Summoner for help.
Lin is rendered unable to move by what seem like tentacles tangled around her feet. The Summoner manages to rescue her, but now she's soaking wet...
A demon with a beak starts tearing Lin's clothes apart. The Summoner manages to defeat the demon, but ends up in rags worse than Lin's.
Lin inspects the setting of the last survey area. The party is surrounded by demons in a flash, though they're excited to bring the survey to its end.
The Summoner continues battling all surrounding demons, until the last one of them lands a desperate final attack...
A few days after Lin's survey comes to its end, the Summoner faces a lot of intriguing cold stares back in the Imperial Capital...
Paris dreams of her early childhood as she dozes off in the Imperial Library. Meanwhile, Noel suddenly appears...
Paris heads towards the Temple of Illusions and runs into the Summoner, who says is in the area on an urgent mission from Summoners' Hall.
As the Summoner approaches the Temple of Illusions, a blinding light suddenly appears, somehow bringing with it the once defeated disciple Zebra.
The Summoner defeats Zebra once again. Lin says she thinks his appearance could be connected to the demon dwelling within the Temple of Illusions.
The disciple Mare shows herself anew before the Summoner. Wielding powers greater than those of a god, she asks about the Summoner's destination.
Mare is defeated by the Summoner once more. As she laughs, she predicts that the Summoner will one day be destroyed by powerless beings.
The disciple Zurg also shows himself, just as Mare had. He says that humans have no hope of governing Grand Gaia.
After the Summoner defeats Zurg, Lin discloses that the power of the demon awaiting in the temple may be that of manifesting one's fears.
The Summoner finally reaches the Temple of Illusions, but just when four strong presences are sensed in the area, communication with Lin goes awry...
The Summoner ends up defeating the Four Fallen Gods instead of the demon. The real demon gets away, but the mission is considered clear for now.
Eriole suddenly shows himself before Paris. He chastises her and challenges her to a battle she doesn't want to fight.
The Eriole Paris had been fighting suddenly disappears. Without even considering that it was all an illusion, Paris goes forth amidst the confusion.
Tesla appears before Paris. Berating her for having been born a noble, Tesla brands Paris her enemy, as well as Eriole's.
Just like Eriole, Tesla also disappears. Without comprehending what is going on around her, Paris continues heading towards the temple.
Eriole appears once more and tries to persuade Paris to join him anew. However, he is suddenly attacked by a mysterious light...
Eriole explains to Paris the type of world he wants to build. However, it is then that Paris remembers the words of her dear childhood friend...
After seeing Eriole transform, Paris finally realizes her enemies have been illusions. Now she is more determined to move forth than ever before!
Paris destroys the demon behind all the illusions, and vows to live her life by helping those who are in need of her power.
Paris finally learns her new purpose after defeating Eriole. However, there is a strong presence emanating from the Temple of Illusions...
After Paris regroups with the Summoner, Lin explains the characteristics of the demon. They head towards the temple to defeat it, but...
With the demon defeated, Paris confesses to the Summoner that it may be good for her to start seeing things from different points of view.
After fighting against the illusions, Paris rediscovers the doubt within her. However, she feels that these doubts are what led her there.
Paris is not surprised in the least to learn she had been fighting against illusions. Instead, she focuses on a way to make her own dreams a reality.
Noel and Rhynt talk about powering up their new mock Units, but they somehow need Lugina to battle a demon with very particular powers to do so.
The Summoner goes after the demon alongside Lugina. Karl also happens to be in the area fulfilling an urgent request from Grahdens.
Lugina runs into an opponent who looks exactly like him. As the fake Lugina provokes the real one, a battle ensues.
The fake Lugina says he's the real deal in both mind and spirit. However, the real Lugina has yet to simmer down, and immediately attacks the fake.
As the fake Lugina tries to provoke the original, Lugina fires back with taunts of his own. The anger each of them feels fuels yet another brawl.
The fake Lugina is defeated by the real Lugina. He flees saying that he wants to learn to control his current body and spirit more efficiently.
Lin informs the Summoner about the target demon. She says it's possible that it has taken on Lugina's shape.
Karl heads towards the Abandoned Metropolis alone. Hearing that other personnel has been dispatched to the area, he gets a hunch as to who it is.
Caught in a mad frenzy, the fake Lugina shows his true demonic nature. Lugina, who is also burning with rage, triggers a fight.
Karl and the Summoner are confused by Lugina's fake. However, after the real Lugina insults them they realize who's the original and fight together.
Lugina defeats the demon Nebulous, and instead of this victory humbling him, it gives his personality a turn for the worse...
The Summoner is suddenly attacked by Lugina upon arriving to the Abandoned Metropolis, but can immediately tell this opponent is a fake.
Upon arriving to his destination, Karl runs into Lugina's fake. Unprovoked by the impostor, he accepts the challenge while keeping his cool.
Noel and Rhynt, who concocted the plan to have Lugina fight Nebulous, are confused as to why Karl was in the area.
After Karl repels the fake Lugina's attack, he wonders why Grahdens has sent him on this mission, and waits for the real Lugina's arrival.
Lugina goes after the demon with Karl. Awaiting them, the demon mentions an incident involving Zagamlung, and Karl intervenes on Lugina's behalf.
Lugina gets angry at Karl for unwantedly sticking up for him and challenges him to a duel. Karl can see that Lugina is serious, so he accepts.
Lugina claims Karl is no match for him after Karl is seemingly unable to fight to the best of his ability. But according to Karl...
Edea, princess of Palmyna, makes a stand against the invasion of the gods and gathers Lorand, Dean, and Loch to fight for her cause.
Lorand explains his battle plans to the Royal Army. Edea, who had persuaded him to join her, gives a great morale boosting speech to her soldiers.
Edea regroups with Loch, who had gone ahead, but it seems that Dean has gone even further ahead. As always, Loch and Dean's animosity surfaces...
Edea regroups with Dean, and Loch picks a fight with Dean for having advanced without permission. Lorand tries to set them straight, but...
The group confirms that a large number of God Army troops guards the way to the God Army Palace. Placing her faith on her soldiers, Edea waits.
Declaring he can't even stand the sight of humans when the Royal Army appears before him, an enraged Zebra attacks.
Zebra deduces the plans of the Palmyna Army. He believes it would be entertaining to see the humans despair after witnessing Cardes's power.
Edea learns that the Royal Army has successfully attacked the God Army. She encourages everyone to do their best, while concerned for their safety.
The God Army moves and clears a path to the palace. Edea thanks everyone before the final battle, but Loch claims it is much too early to do so.
Edea and her comrades face Cardes. The Fallen God's intimidating atmosphere brings everyone down, but Edea's words fill them with hope anew.
Loch's finishing blow opens a gate to the Spirit World. In order to ensure that her friends escape safely, Edea sacrifices herself to seal Cardes...
Loch blames himself for not being able to protect Edea. However, Lafdranya's light shows him that Edea's heart is still beating.
Loch heads towards Obselion Castle to confirm his suspicions, hoping that both Lorand and Dean are on their way there as well.
Surprised to see the Royal Army has survived, Loch tries to lead it without any experience and asks the soldiers to create a diversion to save Edea.
Zebra is furious to see the Royal Army appear before him once again. Claiming it wouldn't be a bad idea to reduce their numbers, he attacks.
Zebra starts acting strange amidst the fierce battle. As if feeling a change in Cardes's state, he flees to his master's side immediately.
Loch finds Dean. As he states he must be the one to save the princess, Dean asks him when he plans to confess his love for Edea...
Lorand's hate towards the God Army has driven him mad with fury within the walls of the ruined Arlind Seminary. Loch and Dean try to reason with him.
Lorand returns to his old self, but refuses to join Loch and Dean. However, he changes his mind as soon as he senses Edea's heartbeat.
Loch and the others enter the Spirit World and meet Cardes. They also see Edea, who lies dormant after sealing Cardes away.
Hearing her friends calling out to her, Edea awakens. However, the seal on Cardes breaks, causing him to lose control over his powers...
Edea decides to give her own life to seal Cardes away for good, and Loch and the rest insist on giving their own lives to help her with the task.
In a desperate effort Lafdranya surpasses its own limits, exhibiting unfathomable power. The Four Heroes launch their final attack to defeat Cardes!
Michele meets Duel-GX, a strange dark object that fell from the sky. Dubbing it "Crabby," Michele takes Duel-GX to her estate.
Lodin burns with rage towards Melchio. Michele hears the details concerning Melchio from Duel-GX, and decides to finish him herself.
SCENARIO_NAME: I Get It, More or Less

DESCRIPTION: Michele decides to face Melchio alongside Duel-GX. The dark machine tries its best to stop Michele, but she will have none of it...
Michele decides to face Melchio alone. Duel-GX tries to stop her, but she refuses to listen and sets off on her own.
Michele meets Tiara and tries to take her along to defeat Melchio. However, with a prior commitment to the people of her village, Tiara refuses...
After scolding Tiara for belittling her own self, Michele proposes they become friends. Surprised, Tiara accepts her proposal...
Disappointed by Tiara's constant belittling of her own self, Michele feels that Tiara has let her down, and takes off...
Zelban appears in pursuit of a dragon. However, Michele has already fought said dragon, and the two begin an argument that turns into a battle...
Zelban decides to fight against Melchio. He says he will do so alone, but that he will not stop Michele and her friends if they choose to come along.
Michele invites Zelban to join her party, but is quickly upset by his half-hearted attitude. She decides to end their exchange there and then.
Lodin reaches Melchio's location aching for a fight. On the other hand, Melchio, who is on auto-mode, labels him an enemy and counterattacks.
Thanks to Lodin's attacks, Melchio is finally rendered immobile. Excited for his victory Lodin takes his leave, but afterwards...
Melchio continues his rampage like nothing happened after being attacked by Lodin. This makes Lodin realize the disadvantages of fighting alone...
Lodin shows up just when Michele mentions Melchio. However, when he says that he'll be gracious enough to lend her a hand...
Lodin crushes a beast. Still yearning for a fight with Melchio, he insists to Michele that he is not a loser.
Lodin crushes a beast and says he's still willing to help, but Michele declines because she wants to fulfill her goal with people she actually likes.
Michele finally finds Melchio. Mistakenly assuming she's being ignored, she decides to pick a fight by doing things that cannot be overlooked.
Michele's attacks render Melchio immobile. Already thinking about her next adventure, Michele leaves the area, but then...
Duel-GX tries to explain to Michele just how strong Melchio truly is, but she dismisses the information claiming her victory is imminent.
Melchio is able to turn off his auto-mode when he feels Duel-GX's presence, but claims he has no need for a world without his creator.
Melchio's power grows and is somehow resurrected. After berating her heartbroken friends, Michele goes after Melchio by herself...
Inspired by Michele's unbroken resolve, her friends decide to stand up and fight once more. Knowing they are behind her, Michele faces Melchio anew.
Duel-GX readies Code 666 to fight against the berserk Melchio, but Michele steps in of her own accord to try to stop them both.
Duel-GX's power and that of Melchio's clash, opening a gate to another world. Michele means to enter the gate in order to bring Duel-GX back...
Michele is able to stop both Duel-GX and Melchio. However, Duel-GX is no longer able to move. Michele is at a loss for words when...
Michele and Zelban finally acknowledge each other's power. She also takes a liking to Zelban after watching his interaction with a hatchling...
オーンよりエイブ山に魔神が出現したことを聞かされるノアと召喚師。その山はエリーゼらがピクニックに向かった場所だった。
仲良くエイブ山に向けて出発するエリーゼ、リム、セラの３人。同じ頃、ノアと召喚師もエイブ山を目指して進んでいたが……。
【エリーゼルート】エリーゼにレイドバトルの仕事について聞くリムたち。だが次第に質問内容はノアとの関係のことになり…。
【エリーゼルート】さらにノアとの関係をエリーゼに聞くリムたち。話は２人がともに魔神討伐隊にいた時のことになるが……。
SCENARIO_NAME: ノアとエリーゼの関係

DESCRIPTION: 【エリーゼルート】コロシアム跡地に到着した３人。エリーゼより崖を登ってエイブ山に行くと聞き、仰天するリムとセラ。
【ノアルート】焦りながら進むノアは、かつて呪傷を受けたエリーゼにとって魔神がそばにいるだけで危険だと召喚師に話す。
【ノアルート】エイブ山頂上に到着したノアたち。そこで目にしたのは、カルとセリアによって魔神が倒されるところだった。
エイブ山を登ろうとするエリーゼだが、そこにノアが到着し、自分と一緒に帰るよう告げる。だがその時、咆哮が響き渡り……。
【ＥＮＤ１】敵を倒したノアは再度自分と一緒に帰るようエリーゼに告げる。彼女もその言葉におとなしく従うことにするが…。
崖を登りエイブ山頂上に着いたエリーゼたち。同様に山頂に着いたノアは、魔神の存在を彼女らに告げ、帰るよう言う。
【ＥＮＤ２】魔神討伐後、リムの計らいで２人きりになるノアとエリーゼ。ノアはエリーゼの呪いを解いてみせると宣言した。
メイリスの面々は新たな神託を受けた。それは、魔神ラグルヴォード討伐のため、イシュグリアに向かえというものだった。
SCENARIO_NAME: イシュグリアへの旅立ち

DESCRIPTION: 目的の魔神との会敵間際、新たな魔神の気配を感じ取る。さらに、彼の前に現れた神徒が、カルナ・マスタの危機を知らせた。
相談の末、ファダルと姉弟が帰還し、残りの３人が魔神を討つことに決まる。６人は再会を誓い、それぞれの戦場へ向かう。
相談の末、クェイド、ディアナ、イヴリスの３人が一度帰還し、様子を探ることに決める。若干の違和感を残したまま……。
SCENARIO_NAME: メイリスの感じた違和感

DESCRIPTION: グランガイアへ帰還するためゲートを探すファダル、クレア、クルトの前にシュスイが現れ問答無用で襲いかかる。
ファダルはクレアに気を使うが、すでに迷いは振り払っていた。決意も新たに進む3人の前に、またもやシュスイが現れる。
グランガイアへのゲートの気配を感じ取るファダルたち。しかし、しつこく追いすがるシュスイによって行く手を阻まれる。
SCENARIO_NAME: 行く手を阻むシュスイ

DESCRIPTION: 今は見逃そうと言ってシュスイは去った。改めて使命を確認したファダルたち3人は、グランガイアへのゲートを潜る。
グランガイアへ帰還するためゲートを探すクェイドたちの前にシュスイが現れる。追跡者を振り払うため、全力で応戦する。
ディアナのクェイドに対する態度の変化に気付くイヴリス。当のクェイドは迫り来るシュスイの気配を敏感に察知していた。
クェイドとディアナの仲が進展しないことに気を揉むイヴリス。クェイドが核心に触れようとすると、シュスイが現れた。
今は見逃そうと言ってシュスイは去った。グランガイアに待ち受ける敵に備え、気を引き締め直した３人はゲートを潜る。
シュスイに迷いを見透かされたクェイドは、グランガイア帰還を取り止め、救援に戻る。嫌な予感を振り払うために。
イシュグリアで邂逅した神徒と魔神。魔神は神徒に言葉を投げるが、神徒はそれには応じない。それぞれの思惑が動き出す。
グレアムと遭遇したメイリスたちは戦闘の末、これを撃破したかに見えた。しかし、グレアムは痛痒を感じさせずに去っていく。
作戦の失敗を感じたクェイドはディアナとイヴリスに逃げるよう告げる。しかし、それを２人が受け入れるはずはない。
SCENARIO_NAME: ラグルヴォートとの戦い

DESCRIPTION: すべては神徒の思惑通りに進んだ。大神皇神衛使たちは離れ離れになりながら、異なる戦場で力尽きる運命にある。
無事に魔神ラグルヴォートを討ち果たしたクェイドたちだったが、彼らがグランガイアに帰還したという記録は残されていない。
クェイドに対して未だ敵愾心を持ち続けるクルト。クレアが斥候に向かう間、ファダルはクルトにクェイドのことを語る。
神徒の策はクェイドの決断によって崩れ去る。分断されずに全員がそろったメイリスは、互いを守るため、敵に立ち向かう。
無事に神徒に勝利し、生き残ることができたメイリスたちは仲間との絆を噛み締める。そんな彼らの前に一体の魔神が現れた。
イシュグリア調査の先遣隊として出発した魔神討伐隊隊長７人。だが、強大な魔神と遭遇し、グリフが離脱することに…。
グリフを心配するミーファを励ますクランツたち。一行はグリフの指示通りに、帰還用ゲートがある場所を目指すことに。
【グリフルート】戦いの中でグリフの強さを感じ取ったシュスイは、「もう１度戦う機会をやろう」と言い、一時撤退する。
【グリフルート】シュスイと対峙したグリフは、彼をクランツたちのもとへ向かわせないため、覚悟を決めて立ち向かう。
【グリフルート】シュスイに敗れたかに見えたグリフ。だが、彼は自らの生命と引き換えに、シュスイの脚に深手を負わせる。
自分が隊長代理でいいのかと迷うクランツ。そんな彼を皆で励ます中、突如地響きとともに魔獣が出現する。
魔獣に対して優勢に戦うクランツたち。だが、魔獣の攻撃で地盤が崩壊。１人はぐれたアイリスは単独行動をしようとするが…。
【アイリスルート】モーラの案内で仲間がいるという場所に向かうアイリス。だが、彼女はモーラの嘘を見破っていた。
【アイリスルート】戦いを繰り広げるモーラとアイリス。だが突如、魔獣の分身体が乱入し、アイリスの生命を奪う…。
遺跡の装置を使って魔獣を撃退することを思いついたロアは、クランツたちを先に行かせるが、カフカのみは戻ってきて…。
魔獣の攻撃で致命傷を負ったロア。装置を暴走させるため、カフカに逃げるように言うが、彼女もすでに動けない状態だった。
突如現れた魔神カロンの強さを感じ取ったクランツとリベラは、ミーファに報告書を託して、１人先に行かせる。
カロンをミーファのもとへ行かせぬため、瀕死になりながらも立ち上がったクランツとリベラは、最期の一撃を放つ…。
帰還用ゲートがある場所に到着したミーファ。だが、それらしいものはどこにも見当たらない。焦る彼の前に魔獣が出現する。
【ＥＮＤ１】魔獣を倒したミーファは、自分たちが見捨てられたことに激怒し、グラデンスとオーンに復讐を誓う。
帰還用ゲートがある場所を目指すことにするクランツたち。一方グリフは死中に活を求める選択肢を思いついていた。
アム＝ユノスによって未来より召喚されたミーファ。“やりなおし”の機会を与えられた彼は運命を変えるため行動を開始する。
【グリフルート】グリフとシュスイの戦いに割って入る未来のミーファ。思わずグリフの名前を叫んでしまうが…。
【グリフルート】グリフがシュスイと対峙する中、再び現れた未来のミーファは、強引に彼らの戦いに参加する。
【グリフルート】グリフと未来のミーファより脚に深手を負わせられたシュスイは、自分の本当の力を見せようとするが…。
SCENARIO_NAME: 戦いはこれで終わりだ

DESCRIPTION: 【アイリスルート】魔獣の攻撃よりアイリスを守る未来のミーファ。彼はその後、アイリスの裏の顔を知るが…。
遺跡の装置を暴走させようとするロアを止める未来のミーファ。そこにカフカも現れ、彼は敵の疑いをかけられるが…。
魔獣を撃退するロアとカフカ。未来のミーファへの警戒心を解いた彼らだが、その関心は徐々にミーファの正体へと…。
魔神カロンを抑え、ミーファを行かせたクランツとリベラ。その直後、未来のミーファが現れ、彼らに加勢を申し出る。
未来のミーファとともにカロンを撃破するクランツとリベラ。ミーファは傷ついた自分を案じる２人に、先に進むよう促す。
SCENARIO_NAME: 守ってくれて、ありがとう

DESCRIPTION: 帰還用ゲートを探すミーファの前に、これまで彼らを襲ってきた魔獣が出現。ミーファは心を奮い立たせ、戦いを挑む…。
ミーファの絶体絶命の窮地をグリフたちが救い、ついに魔獣を撃破する。だが、アム＝ユノスは「ここからが本番」と言い…。
【ＥＮＤ２】次元の扉に飛び込んでいくグリフたちを、影から見守る未来のミーファ。その彼の前にアム＝ユノスが現れる。
ルカナが受けた啓示をもとに、人々を率いて旅を続けるリードたち。ついに約束の地があるとされるミストラルに到着するが…。
【リードルート】ついに約束の地があるとされるミストラルに辿り着いたリードたち。偵察の結果、強敵はいなかったが……。
【リードルート】選んだ行路に関して不安を持つアーネル。その時、ナグネスが突如現れてアーネルに助言を与える。
【リードルート】ナグネスがリードたちと行動をともにすることに。アーネルはナグネスの良さを語るが、他の仲間たちは……。
【リードルート】道中でラインが別行動を申し出る。彼の様子に違和感を覚えたリードは、彼を呼び止めようとするが……。
【ラインルート】神軍の奇襲を察知し、先んじて攻撃を行うライン。戦いが一段落したその時、彼の前に神徒ザーグが現れる。
【ラインルート】ザーグより民衆を奇襲する別部隊の存在を告げられたラインは、傷ついた身体に鞭打ち、それを迎撃に向かう。
【ラインルート】思ってたより敵が少ないことを不思議に感じるライン。だが、神軍のさらなる別働隊を発見する。
【ラインルート】周辺一帯の神軍を殲滅したラインは、そこに現れたアヴァンという男へ、一緒に来ないかと誘うが……。
民衆を助けようと集まった人間側の軍勢と遭遇したアヴァン。神軍を発見した彼らは、ともに迎え撃つことに。
神軍の数が少ないことから、主力が既に通過した後だと察したアヴァン。遅すぎた己の行動に、怒りを露わにする。
人間側の軍勢と合流したアヴァンは、その直後に現れた神徒ザーグと対峙。民衆の脅威を取り除くため、戦いを挑む。
アヴァンの攻撃がザーグを捉え、圧倒する。今からでは人間への追撃が無理だと察したザーグは、その場から退却する……。
【リードルート】離脱したラインに思いを残しつつも、歩みを続けるリードたち。だが彼らの前に神軍の軍勢が向かってくる。
【リードルート】神軍の大軍勢に苦戦するリードたち。そんな中で自分にしかできないことを考えたアーネルは、ある決断を…。
【アーネル＆ナグネスルート】神軍を引き付けることに成功するアーネル。そんな彼のもとへ加勢に現れたのは……。
SCENARIO_NAME: 君はもう立派な戦士です！！

DESCRIPTION: 【アーネル＆ナグネスルート】メアの奸計に気づいたアーネルは自らの命を削ってメアを足止めし、ナグネスに敵の殲滅を託す。
【アーネル＆ナグネスルート】奸計をめぐらしたメア。だがその計略は、そこに現れたある男によって破られていた……！
神軍の仕掛けた罠に手こずるアヴァン。この近くで戦いが起きていたと判断する彼だが、歩みは思うように進まない……。
数多く仕掛けられた神軍の罠が、自分たちの歩みを遅らせるためのものだと判断したアヴァンは、罠の先に敵がいると推測する。
【リードルート】行軍に着いてこれない民衆を置いていくというエル。リードは激昂し、一触即発の事態になるが……。
【エルルート】後方の民衆を守るため駆けつけたエルは、次々と押し寄せる神軍に対して反撃を開始する。
【エルルート】後方の民衆を襲っていた神軍を撃破したエル。その直後、近くで何者かが戦っていることに気付く。
【エルルート】傷つきながらも、民衆が逃げる時間を確保したエル。死を覚悟する彼だったが、そこに老剣士が現れて……。
SCENARIO_NAME: お前はまだ生きている

DESCRIPTION: 人間の軍勢を発見したドルク。民衆を守るため、その者たちとともに戦おうとする彼の前に、魔神グレアムが現れる。
グレアムの不意打ちにより傷つくドルク。助けに現れたエルは、彼を先に逃してグレアムと対峙するが……。
SCENARIO_NAME: あのバカの真似も悪くない

DESCRIPTION: 人間の軍勢と合流したドルクは、神軍との戦闘に突入。彼の存在を厄介に感じた魔神グレアムは、自ら動き出す。
ドルクとの戦いから撤退することを決めたグレアムは、自分が誘導した神軍先行部隊が民衆に迫っていることを告げる。
【リードルート】啓示で示された場所に辿り着いたリードとルカナ。そこで目にした“扉”の中に、民衆を移動させるが…。
【ＥＮＤ１】魔獣を撃退したリードとルカナ。民衆の移動は完了するが、仲間たちが戻ってくることはなかった……。
魔獣を撃退したリードとルカナのもとに、仲間たちが帰還。自分らを救った者たちのことを語り、彼らを救うため動き出す。
民衆が安全な場所に移動したと悟るアヴァンとドルクは、出現した魔獣を相手に、最期の戦いを挑もうとする……！
力を使い果たし、死を覚悟するアヴァンとドルク。だが、そんな２人を新天地へと導くため、リードたちが現れる。
【ＥＮＤ２】魔獣を撃破したリードたちは、あらためてアヴァンとドルクに助力を仰ぎ、新天地でともに生きるよう要請する。
神軍により帝都が攻められる中、王城に呼び出されたシリウスは姉である第一皇女セルヴィアより、ある決断を迫られるが……。
正門の敵を掃討したシリウスは、敵主力部隊が東門に移動していることを察知。東門を守るサレアスのもとへ援軍を送る。
【サレアスルート】東門で奮闘していたサレアスは、敵の援軍を察知。それと同時に正門からの送られた援軍にも気付くが……。
【サレアスルート】強大な威圧感を放つ敵を発見するサレアス。神軍の指揮官だと判断し、戦いを挑もうとする……。
【サレアスルート】神徒へ戦いを挑んだサレアスだが、彼の技は相手に通用しない。絶体絶命の中、彼の前に現れたのは……。
