【サレアスルート】サレアスを守り、カジャの攻撃を受け止めたドゥーレ。困惑するサレアスに彼が伝えた言葉は……。
SCENARIO_NAME: 捨石の役割は果たした

DESCRIPTION: 【シリウスルート】バリウラ兵士の動きが鈍くなったことに気付いたシリウス。その直後、目の前に現れたのはメリナだった。
【シリウスルート】神軍から市民を守るため、奮闘するベルデッド。そんな彼女の前にフェリーネが現れ、ある物を手渡す。
【シリウスルート】皇帝失踪の噂を探るため、王城へ向かおうとするシリウス。ベルデッドも一緒に来るよう誘うが……。
【シリウスルート】次々と現れる神軍に疲弊するラジア。そこに現れたシリウスは、彼女を助けて敵の殲滅に挑む……。
【シリウスルート】皇帝である父の失踪の噂を聞かされたラジアは、父や第一皇女らが何を計画していたのかシリウスに問う。
【シリウスルート】神徒カジャと遭遇したシリウスは、妹たちや市民のために討伐を決心。正々堂々、カジャに戦いを挑む。
【シリウスルート】戦いの中、シリウスの内なる迷いに気づいたカジャは、その迷いがさらなる罪を生むと告げ、その場を去る。
【シリウスルート】激戦を繰り広げるシリウスとカジャ。その２人の間に割って入り、戦いを止めたのはミューゼだった……。
【シリウスルート】ようやく王城の前へ辿り着いたシリウス。だが、王城を攻撃する魔獣を発見し、その討伐を決意する。
【ＥＮＤ１】王城にてセルヴィアと対面するシリウス。再び決断を迫られた彼は、皇帝の計画に従うことを選択する……。
SCENARIO_NAME: 帝国の未来を守るため

DESCRIPTION: 【シリウスルート】シリウスに応急処置を施すミューゼ。その心中には、兄妹たちの仲に関する複雑な思いがあった。
【シリウスルート】魔獣の猛攻により窮地に陥るシリウス。兄を救うため、ミューゼは自らの命を代償に浄化魔法を発動させる。
【シリウスルート】王城にてセルヴィアと対面するシリウスは、皇帝たちの計画には従わず、民のためだけに戦うと告げる。
【シリウスルート】王城付近まで追い詰められた弟妹のもとに駆けつけたシリウス。同時に神徒カジャも彼らの前に出現する。
【ＥＮＤ２】シリウスの思いをその身で受け止め、息絶えるカジャ。その後、新たな決意を固めた兄妹たちが目指す先は……。
A place where Summoners can train for battle by setting certain settings and conditions.
召喚術研究所を訪れた召喚師に、ノエルは召喚師と召喚ユニットがともに戦う力試しの場所を作ったと告げる。
When the gods commenced their attack, King Radmuhl of Elysia was torn between putting up a fight or abandoning his kingdom.
Draegar finally shows himself! Grandt and I have crossed blades with him once before… he’s different from the other Gods we’ve faced thus far…
The distant echoes of a ferocious battle could still be heard from behind you. Another Kingdom of Man has fallen to the Gods.
The mysterious appearance of the floating land masses and the giant rift tear poses a threat to the stability and safety of the region.
Scouts have reported an incredibly powerful being in battle and fending off our strongest veterans. We’ve called for a temporary retreat but his forces are intent on pursuit.
Energy levels are spiking in location but the entrance is being shielded and channelled somewhere else. We have to take out whatever is guarding it and find the source.
The rebels have been losing the fight while I was down below. They’ve withdrawn back into the forest and have been waging guerrilla warfare on Gazia’s troops.
This is it. We need to take out the Rift Conflux that’s keeping the rift open. We can’t let Gazia and his army reach El Gaia. The Centurion, my old lost comrade, stands in our way.
It looks like you’ll be here for a while. I’ll look for a way to get you back home. Meanwhile you can make some friends!
The Lesnik is near. Every night we can hear its howls, driving the local eidolons into a frenzy.
That didn’t go as expected. This creature is clearly holding some kind of grudge against us.
The danged thing won’t let up! The keep’s walls won’t last long with the Lesnik constantly sending in attacks day and night.
You’ve been pulled into a gate and brought back to Eneroth. You are hit by an overwhelming heatwave and gritty sand as far as the eye can see.
HALLO COMRADE! It’s great that you’re here! The Chieftain has tasked you for a very important mission!
Since the unusual sandstorm and my missing outriders , we have had fewer people out to gather food and water.
The Kamekichi alone has fled into the storm. The only place left that Ezra could be is in there. Please take care of the survivors and help watch over the village.
The aberrant creature is deep within in the sandstorm. It’s likely to gain some strength from the noxious fumes from this storm, unnatural as that may be.
Adriesta learns about Gabriela's storied past...and realizes that in Fuindor, time and magic flow strangely...
A lone wulf from the distant north encounters our heroines! But Faelan hates vampires...doesn't she?
Another stranger makes an acquaintance with our wandering band, but it speaks oddly. Very oddly.
Our heroes arrive at an ancient city, stolen from old powers of the land. But a troubling trap reveals itself...
As Adriesta, Gabriela, Ilm and Faelan meet Zael, a battle is begun in earnest. An oath, however, is invoked...
Victory against the Raug has comes, and it tastes sweet...but at what cost?
Noel sends the Summoner into Athensphere's war-torn past - where they meet the powerful Zedus and Ultor!
Ultor muses on the nature of his mechanical foes before taking action.
A lone soldier meets a gracious noble - Aurelia enters the stage!
Ultor continues his battles against the mechanical monstrosities.
It's just a small wound, Ultor says, as he continues to fight the good fight. Aurelia, however, sees things differently.
Zedus muses on Ultor's exploits, and wishes for a battle himself...
Zedus and Ultor regroup, only for an unwelcome party to crash into their reunion. Who is this thing, anyway?
Draegar is defeated, but the answers he provides are unsatisfactory indeed...
Gazia finally makes an appearance before our heroes, and he has but one wish: godhood!
Gazia's monstrosities are defeated, for now. But will you survive Noel's questions?
The heroes of Eneroth assemble and prepare for the quest of their lives. Where will it find them?
Ostagoth is empty...who could be behind this? Avani and Nyami are on the case!
Who is this stranger who has kidnapped Ezra? And what are his intentions?!
The inquisitor has an offer for you - what will you do about it? Enter Allanon!
Allanon has several questions for you! But before th-wait, did you see that?!
Aranvis and Allanon spar with words - meanwhile, a ritual is interrupted...
Aranvis has run off again! You have more important matters to handle, though...
Korzan and Haile examine an empty city...but is it really empty?
Aranvis finally meets Korzan and Haile! Surely nothing can go wrong...right?
Mikael regroups with our erstwhile heroes as they batter down the enemy!
Korzan's reunion with his father is one of bitter goodbyes...and scorching helloes...
The battle between Korzan and Azurai heats up! Bring it on!
Our intrepid heroes have finally found Ezra...but are they too late?
The battle for Ezra's sanity has begun! Will they win, or will she succumb?
Ezra has finally broken free of her chains...but at what cost?
Aranvis returns, angry and vengeful for his spoiled plans. Make him pay!
With defeat comes a greater evil - will our heroes be able to bring victory, or will they be crushed in defeat?
Our intrepid heroes finally make their way to the entrance of the enemy fortress ... only to be attacked by a man on a bird.
Magical enchantments collide and shatter, causing our heroes to be plunged into their own nightmares...
Eerikki confronts his past and is forced to witness his failure anew.
Gabriela is called to account before the Council of vampires. It will not end well.
An spirit of knowledge attempts to understand a conundrum - itself.
Adriesta returns to her past, but all is not well in her head.
Faelan arrives home...but no one is there. What is going on?
Luina and Zelion welcome the Summoner to their doom, as the Overlords plot their next move.
The heroes of Galardhon are plunged into several potential timelines, each as painful as the last.
The heroes of Galardhon are plunged into an ending that never seems to end...
The heroes of Galardhon emerge triumphant against the Raug, but at what cost?
An otherwordly visitor, born of conflict, has a story to tell.
The humans, augmented by Zeruiah's aid, drive the Voidborn back.
Baelfyr presses on towards the Vale.
The humans encounter a Void dryad… but nothing shall stand in the way of their overwhelming victory.
The dryad is forced back, but she gives ground unwillingly and with a heavy toll.
Baelfyr turns his attention towards the South.
Baelfyr arrives at a scene of carnage past.
It is time for Baelfyr's kingdom to expand, before other kingdoms attack in jealousy.
Zeruiah recalls the chain of events that brought Juno-Seto and Ensa-Taya to Aimyhr.
Zeruiah ruminates on her decision to ally with the humans.
Zeruiah has to head East to find her friend.
Juno-Seto departed the Vale for the Eastern plains.
Zeruiah has caught up to Ensa-Taya to find her meeting Juno-Seto.
An epic clash between goddesses.
A fated clash between light and dark.
Juno-Seto absorbs Ensa-Taya's rage into herself.
The true ending of the tale, marked by the creation of the Crystal Spire.
Alraune frustrated Ensa-Taya's advance… for a time.
Faefire has purged the corruption from Alraune, but Baelfyr is not satisfied.
Noel has identified specific Revenants that he wants to know more about. Everything else is fair game.
You are FINALLY done with the tedious string of tests that Noel and Giselle came up with.
Giselle has approached you about a task involving the lost and confused magical beings wandering the aftermath of the Guild Wars.
It's time to hunt down some flame Revenants. Noel and Giselle seem to be strangely ebullient about it.
The contents of the retrieved Battle Log leaves you with a ton of questions… Noel will probably ask you to find more.
Didn't you just get back from the land of hellfire?
More mentions of the Vardket... Things are starting to come together.
We got mud and maims!
These black boxes are pretty sturdy, to be able to record a demonic summons.
You don't feel surprised at being sent back to Orebus, without rest, in the middle of the night. What surprises you, is that you feel okay with it.
More demons. Add that to advanced Orebi technology and the countless guardians, no wonder Orebus ended up a garbage wasteland.
Once more into the breach! It seems that you are starting to enjoy this. Maybe you should get that looked at.
Elise looks uncomfortable with all these mentions of demons, probably due to her affliction.
You vaguely wonder if this last trip into Orebus might be your last trip anywhere.
You hope that this isn't the end of the Orebus Inquiry. Wait... Why would you want to go back?
Giselle is on the precipice of a huge discovery, one that will change the balance of power in Grand Gaia.
The stranger from Everlasting Embrace continues her tale.
Who are these strange ladies in Sero-Anya's dreams, who look so much like her?
This encounter does not seem to be a simple nightmare...
As the night comes to an end, Sero-Anya thankfully brushes off her fears and continues her wandering search for answers.
Several Naga show up with a vengeance against the Leader of Man.
The Naga's plan turns out to be a gift that keeps on giving.
Baelfyr's day gets more interesting with the hour.
Baelfyr distracts Zeruiah with Sero-Anya and barely squeezes his way out of the confrontation.
Back in the Vale, Zeruiah tries to sort out the events linked to her missing friend.
Zeruiah deals with the treacherous humans attacking her home.
Peace is a lie, there is only survival.
As events pass the point of no return, Baelfyr's plans come to fruition.
Baelfyr recalls the war council among the King's Court.
If you're the one committing the second wrong.
Zeruiah interrupts Baelfyr's grand plan.
The poison of revenge stays in her blood forever.
And choose executors that you can trust.
With eyes that glare very far.
The human world, it's a mess.
Saerenthis preaches to his new converts.
Things are finally going well for Saerenthis.
The dragon finally finds his mark.
A specter tortures Zeruiah worse than an enemy ever could.
Zeruiah sends her friends away, and Tevarius looks to a fabled goddess for answers.
A platoon of naga awakens Sero-Anya's powers, but at what cost?
Tevarius and Sero-Anya finally arrives at their destination, and they bring some unwanted guests with them.
Tevarius disagrees with the Queen Mother, N'an-Wang-Mu.
N'an-Wang-Mu seemingly refuses to listen to reason; meanwhile the Naga's march is halted for the moment.
Saskya looks for her archenemy, and unexpectedly finds two.
Sero-Anya comes to a mutual understanding with Ensa-Taya, just in time to meet the Naga in battle.
After penetrating the barrier of Di'yu, the Naga engage Tevarius' band without preamble.
N'an-Wang-Mu finally joins the fray, but Saerenthis is unfazed.
Lull your enemy into predictability while you wait for the perfect moment to strike.
Saerenthis' strategy has been set in motion, and all goes according to plan.
The world is ending. Tsovinar has lost her High Priest, and all shall feel her pain.
A familiar face enters the fray.
Tsovinar reveals her true form, and even the combined might of Juno-Seto and Ensa-Taya is outmatched.
Sero-Anya meets Tsovinar in monumental battle, mortally wounding each other.
The heroes of Aimyhr learn to cope with loss and sadness.
It's a sunny day -- time to get a perfect tan!
Two thugs pick the wrong target to mess with.
Lush, green scenery and crystal lakes, definitely a must-go!
Aimyhr heals… slowly, but surely.
Watch where you step. Especially in a forest.
Feora meets the strangest person this side of the new world.
Feora is determined to get to the root of the troubles her own way, much to Hyshka's dismay.
Violence is not always the solution, unless it is...so Feora thinks.
With the forest cleared of the Razorhawks, Feora and Hyshka find solutions to keep it that way.
Here comes the pest control!
Being dead hasn't diminished Yin-Yin's appetite one bit.
Whether you're dead or alive, a hungry person tends to be a grumpy person.
The Return might as well be a foodie's destination for spirits at this point.
There's really only so much food you can stuff a corpse with, unless your name is Yin-Yin.
Mistaking one big eater for another seems to be an honest mistake many are capable of making.
Lydia might be regretting her decision to invite spirits into her estate.
The fun doesn't stop just because the festival is over.
Being undead comes with the unique perk of ignoring your waistline.
As the Vessels find reasons to bolster their purpose, Neferet travels to the ancients' shrine, driven by her faith.
Neferet, slayer of the corrupt God-King, finds her journey guided by Harakhte, her falcon spirit.
Thoth acknowledges Neferet's worthiness, but the Architect seems less than convinced.
Aesys returns to the Shrine of Dawn and reunites with her son, who resides within Neferet, but the priestess is wary.
Appearances can be deceiving.
The gods may bicker among each other, but they are all invited to watch the fall of civilization.
With Thoth as an ally and her Shard's true self revealed, Neferet resolves to gather the gods before it's too late.
Knowing Noel, you're about to embark on yet another survey for him...This time, through time itself.
In a different Elysia, Crown Prince Gortius readies his army for the final assault against the Northen Pirates.
An unexpected storm forces the desperate pirates to besiege the Elysian fleet with reckless abandon.
Miriam heads in search of Gortius, coming face-to-face with the pirate lord himself...
The battle is won, but the crown prince desires a life lived of his own accord.
Five years later, Gortius' idyllic family life is overshadowed by rumors of his dying father and an empty throne.
Gortius and Miriam find themselves barred from the grand gates to the castle and ordered to be killed on sight.
At the feet of the Elysian throne, the true test of the heir's will begins.
Gortius ascends the throne following the death of his father. A new era comes to Elysia...
Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown, but unrelenting is the heart who protects it.
What is better? To kill them with kindness, or let them live in fear?
Paranoid visions of a different future showing a reality that could have been.
And she shall rule with a fist of iron and a heart of steel.
In the aftermath of the King's passing, civil unrest breaks out.
A familiar face in new and trying times.
Blood runs free in the royal courts as the rebels mount a full assault.
Things didn't work out as planned... for the rebels.
Evie finds her own way to quell the civil unrest; Xenon has the same idea.
Miriam blocks off Estia's escape, but Evie takes sides against her own mother.
The suffering of another life etched indelibly into a soul that can never forget its torment.
The tower shakes with powerful battle magicks as Elaina seeks to undo Miriam's unholy spell.
Elaina tends to Estia reeling from her nightmarish ordeal, while Miriam and Evie are taken to a familiar phantom landscape.
Miriam reveals her prophetic visions -- a chance to defy fate and to save her only daughter at the cost of Evie's freedom.
Amidst the snow-touched steppes of Eiros, mother and daughter find themselves at a point of no return.
Evie takes up the crown as the last monarch of House Valen, but there are some things not even time can erase.
An unlikely alliance with the doppelganger of a world-destroying madman was probably last on your bucket list.
If you can't hit them from the front, disable them from the back.
Loyalty is a double-edged sword, stained with good intentions.
The Sentinel knew full well what disobeying his orders meant, but there is no price too high for a death on one's own terms.
The young demigod Avyn works with the Armorer in the shadows against the oppressive machines.
A burst of interference draws both wanted and unwanted attention.
While you contemplate the situation you're in, Andaria -- now Strategos -- offers Avyn a pardon from her renegade activities.
Taken into custody by the Praetor, there is little you can do for the moment as the Tinkerer is taken away.
With Avyn's timely assistance, you go in search of the Armorer as the clock begins ticking down.
Stronger still are those who do not falter before insurmountable odds.
Timelines collide as you face the poorly made replica of a mad genius in a battle of reversed roles.
An unexpected twist forces you to revise your understanding of a certain faceless entity.
Once again you find yourself brought before the Queen in Cobalt, in a place between wake and sleep.
With Giselle's help, you entreat the aid of otherworldly demons...but are you prepared for the consequences?
The fox -- Hakuzo -- considers your request carefully, but it is not a simple matter to deal with demons.
The deal is struck, and you find yourself upon that dream-shore at last.
Contacting the dead is one thing -- the restless dead, another.
A fleeting calvacade of fragmented memories flood your senses as you surrender to the song.
Hakuzo suspects his old acquaintance has drowned even herself in her sorrows.
For whom does the seal-maiden sing -- the ghosts of the past, or the regret of a love that cannot be?
Few things are felt more strongly than the heart-wrenching clutch of loss.
When ghosts cry, only the wind bears witness to their suffering.
The first and only mistake Aoife would ever make was to love a human.
Freed from her eternal stasis, time moves again for Aoife and her Pactbound.
An ominously coincidental disappearance spells some grave new developments in this burgeoning mystery.
Hakuzo vanishes without any more insight on the missing Summoner, but there's only so much you can do with a demon.
It was very much For Science, even if it means putting yourself out as bait for a space-terror.
Kranus doesn't seem that all amused with the fast-talking Giselle.
Sometimes, you're not the only one in pursuit.
If you start to hear colors, you can safely assume you've completely lost it.
The cryptic memories of someone who's met with a terrible, terrible fate.
That cram session you had at Giselle's really helped in identifying crystals, but did it have anything on crystal girls?
Adopting an eldritch child seems like the least crazy thing you've done this week.
It never really occurred to you how one day you could end up as lunch... on the rocks.
Chasing ghosts--dead or otherwise--is not Hakuzo's idea of a good time.
For good or for ill, encountering a kami has changed Hakuzo's life forever.
There are some things better left in the past, but grudges come at a heavy price.
Time--and space--works in convoluted ways. Just sit back and enjoy the ride.
Suizen reflects on a life long lost to the whims of a divine calling.
Having people disappear right before your eyes is not your idea of a reunion, but at least Hakuzo is still here.
Hakuzo confronts the kami, accusing him of cowardice and accepting the cards dealt to him.
There are few things that can stop cosmic hunger.
Fox hunting is for nobles. Fox-demon hunting is for gods.
A forgotten knight recounts your own scattered memories to you.
Words of encouragment uttered by a continued existence, or kindred spirits in different times?
Looking thus into that unnameable void and seeing your fears reflected was a veritable nightmare.
Flesh, given purpose, cares not for strength of will--only devotion.
Crossing the straits of overlapping dimensions lands Giselle right back in court...with a new attendee.
Forcing yourself to be someone else you're not--even if you were, a long time ago--only ends in disappointment and grief.
Ever has Man sought purpose in existence; and ever has Man struggled, For even purpose to be futile is the ultimate terror.
To imagine creatures with such disparate goals to belong on one side of this great conflict... Can such things be?
Having lost sight of the Queen's whereabouts, your band of misfits seeks a way out of this predicament in their own way.
Dreams often feel real to the dreamer, and not so much to the waker.
Home--riding home, at last, through darkness divine.
The dance goes lightly through the grove.
When in the nadir, do as the Erlking tells you to.
Wanderers in a desert drawn to the same purpose for different reasons.
One life for another hardly seems fair, especially when you're the one forced to make that decision.
The new rift made by the slithery totem seems to take you somewhere familiar...
Some do not simply allow sleeping serpents to lie--especially when it is not their time to die.
Inara recalls a cataclysmic flood that seems important in some way.
A goddess not only remembers; a goddess also learns and bides her time.
One person's fortuitous survival is another's can of terrible, black-hole-dwelling worms.
It was just a color out of space--a frightful, gestating entity from unformed realms.
To listen, and to remember that memories flow--sometimes between minds.
To wander was the Hound's instinct. To wonder was not; and now she pays the ultimate price.
To be of one mind and one purpose, and to learn from those before you.
To be reborn, again and again, until you reach a perfect form--even if it is not yours.
Forbidden is the rite, sacred the soul-
Through the Devourer all things must go-
Only ashes remain in neverending cold.
Knowing this, what will you choose?
You reject Kranus, and decide to put down the errant Voidling.
Your path ends in silence. Your fight, at long last, is over--and your rest awaits.
You defy the Queen in Cobalt, and her everlasting silence.
Your path is paved with conflict. Your fight continues, and with it, a fearful hope.
Welcome to an odd sort of theater - your audience awaits you with bated breath. Don't die.
A fallen warrior meets with a regal vampire. Words are exchanged, and a truce of sorts formed.
Two warriors marked with the Fuinsignum talk on the road. one realizes the depths of her naivete.
Reckless determination has its consequences. perhaps a nap under the sun is in order.
An idyllic journey reaches its destination - a meeting amidst swarms of demons.
The truth turns one's beliefs into shreds as awful facts are laid bare. A battle begins.
Death is no reprieve for those bound in infernal pacts. Meanwhile, victory leaves a bitter taste in one's mouth.
Tormented by the Raug and the loss of her husband's phylactery, Nimune vowed vengeance against her foes. Defeat her inner demons and bring her back to sanity!
To begin the conquest of the reshaped world, the Raug have resurrected their servants Luina & Zael to destroy the Imperial City.
To begin the conquest of the reshaped world, the Raug have resurrected their servants Luina & Zael to destroy the Imperial City.
With her newfound powers, Elaina seeks to undo the deaths of Xenon & Estia and in the act, risk sundering the fabric of time.
As time runs out, will Elaina succeed in committing the grave taboo of time manipulation?
Will the forgotten magic of time manipulation be used with malicious intent?
After entrapping the chronomage within his clutches, the demigod Draegar descends down the meandering columns of the Tower of Ashes.
With Estia's curse lifted and her powers restored, she instructs the Summoner to give chase and confront the Armoured Pursuer.
Against her will, the chronomage casts a portal to Athensphere while time is running out for Grandt..
After the events of Raid: Athensphere, Tridon convenes a council of demigods to an emergency session.
The demigods march to their first skirmish, but Gazia has prepared some tricks up his sleeve.
Gazia continues to surprise the demigods with new technology and magics. Thankfully, their victories on the battlefield thus far have been extremely heartening.
The demigods have faced off their most challenging obstacle yet. How much further can they go? Gazia's army seems an endless tide.
SCENARIO_NAME: The War Has Only Just Begun

DESCRIPTION: Kielazar leads the resistance to the Imperial City, where the Raug are massing for the final assault on the Heavens.
Raquiel is ordered to execute Adriesta and turn over Zelion to the Titans. Will she be able to do it?
Raquiel is subdued, her spirit broken. The Raug forcibly unite with the weakened Titans and combine into the Raug Titan.
You are a fool, berserker - for who will watch those that wish to come home? Who will tell them to stop?
Elaina awaits a cruel punishment from her tormentors. Elsewhere in the barren lands of war-torn Athensphere, the demigods find themselves at Gazia's stronghold...
An injured Grandt and the Summoner brainstorm ways to track down Draegar. Out of time and ideas, Grandt recalls a certain "disciple" of Elaina's at her mage academy.
After the fight, Nia grudgingly accepts Grandt and the Summoner as allies, and proceeds to join in their search for Elaina rather than going at it herself.
The Elysians engage in their final showdown against the "god" who had so tormented them and their home.
Draegar is soundly beaten by the Elysian inhabitants he once threatened. Grandt prepares to execute him, but Elaina orders him to stop, pointing out a swift death was far too good for the monster..
Amid the desolate, war-torn ruins of shattered Athensphere... Gazia, the Mad Heretic, smirks at the prone form of Ultor, once the strongest among the demigods.
A gargantuan moving fortress hovers slowly toward the demigods, while the landbound army steamrolls anything in its path.
The demigoddess arcs across the sky, stopping briefly right before a cavernous opening in the fortress's facade.
The all-encompassing Void curls about the remaining demigods, a sickening swirl of shadow and stardust.
The final moments of the demigods and their cosmic adversary remains seared in your mind.
In the wake of the Voidborn invasion of Aimyhr, the Central Province home to the majority of the humans had been left battered and beaten.
A handsome man with elven features awakens in a dark, subterranean cave, groggy from what seemed to be an extraordinarily long rest.
An ostentatiously dressed figure slithers in, accompanied by two heavily-armored warriors.
Tevarius turns to confront the High Priest himself, his frown is met with a bloodthirsty smirk.
As thunder and lightning crashed around them, the mighty storm dragon's maws snapped down on its opponent.
Show off your knowledge about Grand Gaia! Join Rizky and Shaly in this amazing trivia game!
Thank you for making the 5th Anniversary possible! Let Rizky and Shaly show their appreciation for you too!
Heroes have begun their descent into the nightmare-laden halls that Xie'Jing calls home.
Heroes have arrived at the lair of the witch - will they defeat Xie'jing, or will they be eaten alive?
In the shattered remains of Nick's workshop, two very different creatures come to life. What could be the story behind their magical awakening?
A wandering figure tries to make sense of a chaotic world while a lone sentinel continues to find corpses. Who will find who first?
After much searching, Silvie finally catches up with Nick. However, how will Haido's interruption affect the party's delicate situation?
Haido and Silvie return to Nick in the aftermath of their battle, but where will their journey go next?
After he sacrificed his luck and saved a child, Kitsu has been constantly on the run. He is so tired…
Linlin and Bjorn has been looking for Kitsu for a long time. Will they find him before he succumbs to fatigue?
Kitsu and Linlin are finally reunited! They have no time to catch up, though, as the fox, fairy and bear are quickly surrounded by Kitsu's pursuers.
As the nightmare begins, Fei and Fang find themselves in a dangerous situation!
As the nightmare continues, Fei and Fang delve deeper into the murky depths of Xie'jing's trap!
As the nightmare continues, Fei and Fang delve deeper into the murky depths of Xie'jing's trap!
As the nightmare reaches its apex, Fei and Fang arrive in the fight of their lives - and their hearts!
As the nightmare reaches its apex, Fei and Fang arrive in the fight of their lives - and their hearts!
Carrol continues her search for the special Easter eggs - while a robot wakes from its slumber...
A robotic guardian has found Carrol and demands that she hand over her eggs! But it wasn't expecting a fight..
The battle for Easter eggs heats up - and our plucky robot suddenly remembers the past...
Time to test your mettle against Ochaco Uraraka! Hope you know how to fly!
The fight's just getting started! Can you take Izuku Midoriya head-on, or will you break under his assault?
Two heroes for the price of one! Are you ready for this battle at the Unforseen Simulation Joint? Let's go!
Two heroes for the price of one! Are you ready for this battle at the Unforseen Simulation Joint? Let's go!
Jump around with Tsuyu Asui in our opening matchup! Will you succeed in this sticky situation?
Time for the battle's climax! Can you defeat the Symbol of Peace? Time to find out!
Time for the battle's climax! Can you defeat the Symbol of Peace? Time to find out!
The Summoner has gone missing! What happens next?
Noel is still searching for the summoner. Where are they now?
A stranger greets you in front of an old mansion, thanking you for accepting his request. What is the nature of his request?
The Main Hall is dusty from abandonment, and a few doors lead to the rest of this forbidding manor. Your search begins here.
Compared to the rest of the manor, the study is still well-kept. Books on medicine and other disciplines fill the shelves.
At the top of the stairwell stands a shadowy silhouette, though it does not seem to have noticed your presence...yet.
At the top of the stairwell stands a shadowy silhouette, though it does not seem to have noticed your presence...yet.
Eerie muttering emanates from what appears to be a child's playroom. The shadowy figure seems be pacing around in there…
Eerie muttering emanates from what appears to be a child's playroom. The shadowy figure seems be pacing around in there…
Amateur paintings, mostly of flowers and skeletons, hang on the wall. You can't help but feel that you are being watched.
Amateur paintings, mostly of flowers and skeletons, hang on the wall. You can't help but feel that you are being watched.

Having explored the rest of the manor, only the bedroom remains. Laughter punctuated by choked sobs fills the eerie air. explored the rest of the manor, only the bedroom remains. Laughter punctuated by choked sobs fills the eerie air.
Having explored the rest of the manor, only the bedroom remains. Laughter punctuated by choked sobs fills the eerie air.
After successfully helping Theodor subdue Florence, he asks of you to visit him again in a few days so that he properly prepare a suitable compensation for you.
A dimensional rift with a familiar signature has appeared! Who could it be?
A blue-haired girl has stumbled out of the rift. Who is she?
The Summoner defeats Wendy in combat. As she begins to panic, the rift appears again, and a man with wild, spiky hair bursts through it.
Gajeel is glad to see Wendy, but upon noticing her injury, flies into a rage. He tells Wendy to heal herself and charges straight into combat with the Summoner.
The Summoner successfully defends against Gajeel. As Gajeel and Wendy prepare to launch a combined assault, a familiar voice calls out from the forest.
Wendy praises the Summoner on their strength, but Gajeel doesn't seem satisfied with losing the fight. He challenges the Summoner to fight both him and Wendy at once.
The Summoner emerges victorious against both Dragon Slayers and Natsu gets all fired up watching the battle!
Before they return to their world, the group bids the Summoner farewell. Wendy tells the Summoner that she smells something incredibly dark and dangerous.
Noel informs that a menacing presence threatening Grand Gaia has appeared. At the same time, the summoner also senses a terrifying presence.
A figure with unspeakable amounts of dark magic energy appears from the crack in reality. Zeref, considered the most evil mage in the entirety of the Magic World emerges.
After the battle, Zeref expresses relief that the Summoner is unscathed. The Black Wizard leaves, disappearing back into the portal.
Noel detects the presence of a great black dragon swiftly entering Grand Gaia through a rift. He briefs the Summoner on this threat and sends them out to investigate.
The summoner manages to defeat Acnologia. He reports back to Noel and proceeds to assess the damage caused by Acnologia in Grand Gaia.
Noel welcomes the Summoner back, musing that they barely avoided death at the hands of these extremely powerful individuals.
After hearing from the town guard, Linlin, Bjorn, and an unenthused Kitsu begin their search for the missing children. Will they pick up the trail?
Meanwhile, a cheerful girl named Annette lends her aid to the effort! This ought to be a blast!
A shadowy figure appears out of nowhere and strikes at the party! How will they resolve this?
A shadowy figure appears out of nowhere and strikes at the party! How will they resolve this?
Nick and Silvie have arrived in the outskirts of the town. Will they find what they seek here?
A reunion of Silvie and Haido, with Annette in tow! Can they convince Nick to their cause?
The party tries to cheer Nick up, but a shadow from the past pays them another unwanted visit…
The party tries to cheer Nick up, but a shadow from the past pays them another unwanted visit…
Krampus, a spirit of vengeance given life by Nick's despair, threatens to destroy everything he stood for. Banish Krampus and save everyone's Winter!
Krampus, a spirit of vengeance given life by Nick's despair, threatens to destroy everything he stood for. Banish Krampus and save everyone's Winter!
[Side: Galene] Galene, a highly specialized military android, recalls the last few months of her "life" prior to dismantlement…
[Side: Galene] Having rejected her fate, Galene tries to break out of confinement. A certain young techpunk on her mind gives her courage.
[Side: Galene] Having rejected her fate, Galene tries to break out of confinement. A certain young techpunk on her mind gives her courage.
[Side: Galene] The door unlocks, indicating Vektor's presence. Surprised and overcome with emotion, Galene sets a course to meet him...
[Side: Vektor] Arriving in New Cravich, a high-tech city that has recently announced a public "restructuring" of its sentient androids. What will you find here?
[Side: Vektor] Vektor takes you along to infiltrate the Corporation's headquarters to rescue the android Galene from destruction.
[Side: Vektor] Vektor takes you along to infiltrate the Corporation's headquarters to rescue the android Galene from destruction.
[Side: Vektor] The door unlocks, indicating Galene is still active. You and Vektor head into the facility, hoping to get ahead of security.
Vektor and Galene finally reunite, but the Corporation has them in its grip. Will they break through this unfeeling tyranny?
Vektor and Galene finally reunite, but the Corporation has them in its grip. Will they break through this unfeeling tyranny?
[Hard Mode] Knowing that Vektor and Galene are safe for now, you decide to get to the bottom of the Corporation's sinister AI.
With the antifield disabled, your powers return. You send Vektor and Galene away, and prepare for a night of scrapping.
Join Marianne to discover the fabled Rainbow Crystal.
Marianne thanks you for your service.
Join Auberi as he reveals the truth behind his experiments.
Auberi appreciates you befriending him.
It seems that everyone's coming to fight in this tournament!
But these battles are only the beginning. You will have to make a choice...
Assist Kyo Kusanagi in the Royal Rumble.
Assist Chizuru Kagura in the Royal Rumble.
Assist Iori Yagami in the Royal Rumble.

The Night of the Moon (End)

DESCRIPTION: A rumbling noise can be heard as the earth begins to shake and quiver...
My blood has been boiling, calling me to fight!
Now that's done with, and Orochi sealed away.
My blood's been boiling for a fight with you! You'll pay for what you did to my family!
Orochi's evil won't trouble the world any more.
Tsukiyama lures Kaneki and Touka into a trap.
Things do not go well for Tsukiyama.
After suffering intensely at the hands of a sadist, Kaneki achieves his ghoul form.
With his newfound power, Kaneki is ready to inflict his pain back upon his nemesis.
The Summoner finds two wandering swordsmen named Jin and Mugen.
The Summoner decides to help Jin look for a young girl named Fuu.
They are not alone in the forest.
Jin finds a pendant of Fuu's, along with some unpleasant individuals.
Jin finds Fuu, safe and sound.
Jin is mistaken for a wanted killer.
Jin finds Fuu, after letting the angry warriors go.
The Summoner decides to help Mugen capture a wanted killer around the parts.
They decide to ask about the killer in a nearby village.
Mugen hears of a shady man with a strange weapon.
The defeated zombies remind Mugen of Shoryu, a past foe thought to be dead.
Mugen is confronted by angry and scared villagers.
Mugen gets ready for a rematch with Shoryu.
Everybody splits up in their search for a young girl named Fuu.
The Summoner has yet to find Fuu.
The Summoner is attacked by the undead
The Summoner finds Fuu after fighting his way free of the undead.
The Summoner is mistaken for a killer by some warriors, allowing the real killer to escape.
The Summoner clears up the misunderstanding, and brings Fuu back safely.
Fuu wanders off in search of valuable mushrooms.
Her search so far has yielded no results, but that's not going to get her down.
Mugen faces off against an undead Shoryu in an even match, except this time Shoryu knows about his last-ditch trick...
There are accidents in laboratories, and then there are happy accidents in Noel's laboratory.
Even a genius can't prepare for the sky falling -- especially when it's an interdimensional traveler.
It seems that you were late to the party. A little more than late.
Riling up the man who has been itching to capture you is either the best show of confidence or the worst misstep.
Your escape from the destruction of the "other" Athensphere was only the beginning.
Left in the wake of your sudden disappearance, Noel and Giselle mount a rescue effort with what little information they have.
Walking interminably through the wasteland of your own mind, fragments of the past lay before you...
The Queen is fascinated by your mind. You're not sure if that's a good thing.
If you could change the world with your own two hands, would things have turned out differently?
In that "other" space, where the threads of fate unravel in another direction, a new destiny awaits another familiar world.
Always remember to get up and stretch. Even if you're the King of Elysia.
It isn't Gortius's first hunt, but there's always a bigger boar.
Not every princess wants to be a princess.
Few things are scarier than a father confronting his child's would-be abductor.
The first signs of a family slowly splintering apart.
Letting go is far more difficult than holding on, but both are equally painful.
Evgenia takes solace in the final days of her father, and embraces a new dawn as the last monarch of Elysia.
It's easier to dislike and shun that which one does not understand.
The Gods and Vessels sit in grim tension, when Set arrives to shake things up.
The impartial Arbiter is forced to act in order to save the world from endless chaos.
In spite of the Gods' efforts, the God-King's plans come to fruition.
